Verse: So taste [punishment] because you forgot the meeting of this, your Day; indeed, We have [accordingly] forgotten you. And taste the punishment of eternity for what you used to do."

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Only those believe in Our verses who, when they are reminded by them, fall down in prostration and exalt [ Allah ] with praise of their Lord, and they are not arrogant.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: They arise from [their] beds; they supplicate their Lord in fear and aspiration, and from what We have provided them, they spend.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: And no soul knows what has been hidden for them of comfort for eyes as reward for what they used to do.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Then is one who was a believer like one who was defiantly disobedient? They are not equal.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: As for those who believed and did righteous deeds, for them will be the Gardens of Refuge as accommodation for what they used to do.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: But as for those who defiantly disobeyed, their refuge is the Fire. Every time they wish to emerge from it, they will be returned to it while it is said to them, "Taste the punishment of the Fire which you used to deny."

Name: The Prostration
Verse: And we will surely let them taste the nearer punishment short of the greater punishment that perhaps they will repent.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: And who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the verses of his Lord; then he turns away from them? Indeed We, from the criminals, will take retribution.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture, so do not be in doubt over his meeting. And we made the Torah guidance for the Children of Israel.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: And We made from among them leaders guiding by Our command when they were patient and [when] they were certain of Our signs.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them, [as] they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs; then do they not hear?

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Have they not seen that We drive the water [in clouds] to barren land and bring forth thereby crops from which their livestock eat and [they] themselves? Then do they not see?

Name: The Prostration
Verse: And they say, "When will be this conquest, if you should be truthful?"

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "On the Day of Conquest the belief of those who had disbelieved will not benefit them, nor will they be reprieved."

Name: The Prostration
Verse: So turn away from them and wait. Indeed, they are waiting.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O Prophet, fear Allah and do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord. Indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And rely upon Allah ; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Allah has not made for a man two hearts in his interior. And He has not made your wives whom you declare unlawful your mothers. And he has not made your adopted sons your [true] sons. That is [merely] your saying by your mouths, but Allah says the truth, and He guides to the [right] way.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Call them by [the names of] their fathers; it is more just in the sight of Allah . But if you do not know their fathers - then they are [still] your brothers in religion and those entrusted to you. And there is no blame upon you for that in which you have erred but [only for] what your hearts intended. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: The Clans
Verse: The Prophet is more worthy of the believers than themselves, and his wives are [in the position of] their mothers. And those of [blood] relationship are more entitled [to inheritance] in the decree of Allah than the [other] believers and the emigrants, except that you may do to your close associates a kindness [through bequest]. That was in the Book inscribed.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We took from the prophets their covenant and from you and from Noah and Abraham and Moses and Jesus, the son of Mary; and We took from them a solemn covenant.

Name: The Clans
Verse: That He may question the truthful about their truth. And He has prepared for the disbelievers a painful punishment.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O you who have believed, remember the favor of Allah upon you when armies came to [attack] you and We sent upon them a wind and armies [of angels] you did not see. And ever is Allah , of what you do, Seeing.

Name: The Clans
Verse: There the believers were tested and shaken with a severe shaking.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And [remember] when the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease said, " Allah and His Messenger did not promise us except delusion,"

Name: The Clans
Verse: And when a faction of them said, "O people of Yathrib, there is no stability for you [here], so return [home]." And a party of them asked permission of the Prophet, saying, "Indeed, our houses are unprotected," while they were not exposed. They did not intend except to flee.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And if they had been entered upon from all its [surrounding] regions and fitnah had been demanded of them, they would have done it and not hesitated over it except briefly.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And they had already promised Allah before not to turn their backs and flee. And ever is the promise to Allah [that about which one will be] questioned.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Never will fleeing benefit you if you should flee from death or killing; and then [if you did], you would not be given enjoyment [of life] except for a little."

Name: The Clans
Verse: Say, "Who is it that can protect you from Allah if He intends for you an ill or intends for you a mercy?" And they will not find for themselves besides Allah any protector or any helper.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Already Allah knows the hinderers among you and those [hypocrites] who say to their brothers, "Come to us," and do not go to battle, except for a few,

Name: The Clans
Verse: Indisposed toward you. And when fear comes, you see them looking at you, their eyes revolving like one being overcome by death. But when fear departs, they lash you with sharp tongues, indisposed toward [any] good. Those have not believed, so Allah has rendered their deeds worthless, and ever is that, for Allah , easy.

Name: The Clans
Verse: They think the companies have not [yet] withdrawn. And if the companies should come [again], they would wish they were in the desert among the bedouins, inquiring [from afar] about your news. And if they should be among you, they would not fight except for a little.

Name: The Clans
Verse: There has certainly been for you in the Messenger of Allah an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day and [who] remembers Allah often.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And when the believers saw the companies, they said, "This is what Allah and His Messenger had promised us, and Allah and His Messenger spoke the truth." And it increased them only in faith and acceptance.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Among the believers are men true to what they promised Allah . Among them is he who has fulfilled his vow [to the death], and among them is he who awaits [his chance]. And they did not alter [the terms of their commitment] by any alteration -

Name: The Clans
Verse: That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth and punish the hypocrites if He wills or accept their repentance. Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And Allah repelled those who disbelieved, in their rage, not having obtained any good. And sufficient was Allah for the believers in battle, and ever is Allah Powerful and Exalted in Might.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And He brought down those who supported them among the People of the Scripture from their fortresses and cast terror into their hearts [so that] a party you killed, and you took captive a party.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And He caused you to inherit their land and their homes and their properties and a land which you have not trodden. And ever is Allah , over all things, competent.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O Prophet, say to your wives, "If you should desire the worldly life and its adornment, then come, I will provide for you and give you a gracious release.

Name: The Clans
Verse: But if you should desire Allah and His Messenger and the home of the Hereafter - then indeed, Allah has prepared for the doers of good among you a great reward."

Name: The Clans
Verse: O wives of the Prophet, whoever of you should commit a clear immorality - for her the punishment would be doubled two fold, and ever is that, for Allah , easy.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And whoever of you devoutly obeys Allah and His Messenger and does righteousness - We will give her her reward twice; and We have prepared for her a noble provision.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O wives of the Prophet, you are not like anyone among women. If you fear Allah , then do not be soft in speech [to men], lest he in whose heart is disease should covet, but speak with appropriate speech.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And abide in your houses and do not display yourselves as [was] the display of the former times of ignorance. And establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. Allah intends only to remove from you the impurity [of sin], O people of the [Prophet's] household, and to purify you with [extensive] purification.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And remember what is recited in your houses of the verses of Allah and wisdom. Indeed, Allah is ever Subtle and Acquainted [with all things].

Name: The Clans
Verse: Indeed, the Muslim men and Muslim women, the believing men and believing women, the obedient men and obedient women, the truthful men and truthful women, the patient men and patient women, the humble men and humble women, the charitable men and charitable women, the fasting men and fasting women, the men who guard their private parts and the women who do so, and the men who remember Allah often and the women who do so - for them Allah has prepared forgiveness and a great reward.

Name: The Clans
Verse: It is not for a believing man or a believing woman, when Allah and His Messenger have decided a matter, that they should [thereafter] have any choice about their affair. And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly strayed into clear error.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And [remember, O Muhammad], when you said to the one on whom Allah bestowed favor and you bestowed favor, "Keep your wife and fear Allah ," while you concealed within yourself that which Allah is to disclose. And you feared the people, while Allah has more right that you fear Him. So when Zayd had no longer any need for her, We married her to you in order that there not be upon the believers any discomfort concerning the wives of their adopted sons when they no longer have need of them. And ever is the command of Allah accomplished.

Name: The Clans
Verse: There is not to be upon the Prophet any discomfort concerning that which Allah has imposed upon him. [This is] the established way of Allah with those [prophets] who have passed on before. And ever is the command of Allah a destiny decreed.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Muhammad is not the father of [any] one of your men, but [he is] the Messenger of Allah and last of the prophets. And ever is Allah , of all things, Knowing.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O you who have believed, remember Allah with much remembrance

Name: The Clans
Verse: And exalt Him morning and afternoon.

Name: The Clans
Verse: It is He who confers blessing upon you, and His angels [ask Him to do so] that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And ever is He, to the believers, Merciful.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Their greeting the Day they meet Him will be, "Peace." And He has prepared for them a noble reward.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O Prophet, indeed We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And one who invites to Allah , by His permission, and an illuminating lamp.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And give good tidings to the believers that they will have from Allah great bounty.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites but do not harm them, and rely upon Allah . And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O You who have believed, when you marry believing women and then divorce them before you have touched them, then there is not for you any waiting period to count concerning them. So provide for them and give them a gracious release.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O Prophet, indeed We have made lawful to you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you [of captives] and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a believing woman if she gives herself to the Prophet [and] if the Prophet wishes to marry her, [this is] only for you, excluding the [other] believers. We certainly know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and those their right hands possess, [but this is for you] in order that there will be upon you no discomfort. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: The Clans
Verse: You, [O Muhammad], may put aside whom you will of them or take to yourself whom you will. And any that you desire of those [wives] from whom you had [temporarily] separated - there is no blame upon you [in returning her]. That is more suitable that they should be content and not grieve and that they should be satisfied with what you have given them - all of them. And Allah knows what is in your hearts. And ever is Allah Knowing and Forbearing.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Not lawful to you, [O Muhammad], are [any additional] women after [this], nor [is it] for you to exchange them for [other] wives, even if their beauty were to please you, except what your right hand possesses. And ever is Allah , over all things, an Observer.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O you who have believed, do not enter the houses of the Prophet except when you are permitted for a meal, without awaiting its readiness. But when you are invited, then enter; and when you have eaten, disperse without seeking to remain for conversation. Indeed, that [behavior] was troubling the Prophet, and he is shy of [dismissing] you. But Allah is not shy of the truth. And when you ask [his wives] for something, ask them from behind a partition. That is purer for your hearts and their hearts. And it is not [conceivable or lawful] for you to harm the Messenger of Allah or to marry his wives after him, ever. Indeed, that would be in the sight of Allah an enormity.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Whether you reveal a thing or conceal it, indeed Allah is ever, of all things, Knowing.

Name: The Clans
Verse: There is no blame upon women concerning their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their brothers' sons or their sisters' sons or their women or those their right hands possess. And fear Allah . Indeed Allah is ever, over all things, Witness.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Indeed, Allah confers blessing upon the Prophet, and His angels [ask Him to do so]. O you who have believed, ask [ Allah to confer] blessing upon him and ask [ Allah to grant him] peace.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Indeed, those who abuse Allah and His Messenger - Allah has cursed them in this world and the Hereafter and prepared for them a humiliating punishment.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And those who harm believing men and believing women for [something] other than what they have earned have certainly born upon themselves a slander and manifest sin.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O Prophet, tell your wives and your daughters and the women of the believers to bring down over themselves [part] of their outer garments. That is more suitable that they will be known and not be abused. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: The Clans
Verse: If the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease and those who spread rumors in al-Madinah do not cease, We will surely incite you against them; then they will not remain your neighbors therein except for a little.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Accursed wherever they are found, [being] seized and massacred completely.

Name: The Clans
Verse: People ask you concerning the Hour. Say," Knowledge of it is only with Allah . And what may make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near."

Name: The Clans
Verse: Indeed, Allah has cursed the disbelievers and prepared for them a Blaze.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Abiding therein forever, they will not find a protector or a helper.

Name: The Clans
Verse: The Day their faces will be turned about in the Fire, they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger."

Name: The Clans
Verse: And they will say, "Our Lord, indeed we obeyed our masters and our dignitaries, and they led us astray from the [right] way.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Our Lord, give them double the punishment and curse them with a great curse."

Name: The Clans
Verse: O you who have believed, be not like those who abused Moses; then Allah cleared him of what they said. And he, in the sight of Allah , was distinguished.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O you who have believed, fear Allah and speak words of appropriate justice.

Name: The Clans
Verse: He will [then] amend for you your deeds and forgive you your sins. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly attained a great attainment.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Indeed, we offered the Trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains, and they declined to bear it and feared it; but man [undertook to] bear it. Indeed, he was unjust and ignorant.

Name: Saba
Verse: He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein. And He is the Merciful, the Forgiving.

Name: Saba
Verse: But those who disbelieve say, "The Hour will not come to us." Say, "Yes, by my Lord, it will surely come to you. [ Allah is] the Knower of the unseen." Not absent from Him is an atom's weight within the heavens or within the earth or [what is] smaller than that or greater, except that it is in a clear register -

Name: Saba
Verse: That He may reward those who believe and do righteous deeds. Those will have forgiveness and noble provision.

Name: Saba
Verse: But those who strive against Our verses [seeking] to cause failure - for them will be a painful punishment of foul nature.

Name: Saba
Verse: And those who have been given knowledge see that what is revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, and it guides to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy.

Name: Saba
Verse: But those who disbelieve say, "Shall we direct you to a man who will inform you [that] when you have disintegrated in complete disintegration, you will [then] be [recreated] in a new creation?

Name: Saba
Verse: Has he invented about Allah a lie or is there in him madness?" Rather, they who do not believe in the Hereafter will be in the punishment and [are in] extreme error.

Name: Saba
Verse: Then, do they not look at what is before them and what is behind them of the heaven and earth? If We should will, We could cause the earth to swallow them or [could] let fall upon them fragments from the sky. Indeed in that is a sign for every servant turning back [to Allah ].

Name: Saba
Verse: And We certainly gave David from Us bounty. [We said], "O mountains, repeat [Our] praises with him, and the birds [as well]." And We made pliable for him iron,

Name: Saba
Verse: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind - its morning [journey was that of] a month - and its afternoon [journey was that of] a month, and We made flow for him a spring of [liquid] copper. And among the jinn were those who worked for him by the permission of his Lord. And whoever deviated among them from Our command - We will make him taste of the punishment of the Blaze.

Name: Saba
Verse: They made for him what he willed of elevated chambers, statues, bowls like reservoirs, and stationary kettles. [We said], "Work, O family of David, in gratitude." And few of My servants are grateful.

Name: Saba
Verse: And when We decreed for Solomon death, nothing indicated to the jinn his death except a creature of the earth eating his staff. But when he fell, it became clear to the jinn that if they had known the unseen, they would not have remained in humiliating punishment.

Name: Saba
Verse: There was for [the tribe of] Saba' in their dwelling place a sign: two [fields of] gardens on the right and on the left. [They were told], "Eat from the provisions of your Lord and be grateful to Him. A good land [have you], and a forgiving Lord."

Name: Saba
Verse: But they turned away [refusing], so We sent upon them the flood of the dam, and We replaced their two [fields of] gardens with gardens of bitter fruit, tamarisks and something of sparse lote trees.

Name: Saba
Verse: And We placed between them and the cities which We had blessed [many] visible cities. And We determined between them the [distances of] journey, [saying], "Travel between them by night or day in safety."

Name: Saba
Verse: But [insolently] they said, "Our Lord, lengthen the distance between our journeys," and wronged themselves, so We made them narrations and dispersed them in total dispersion. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.

Name: Saba
Verse: And Iblees had already confirmed through them his assumption, so they followed him, except for a party of believers.

Name: Saba
Verse: And he had over them no authority except [it was decreed] that We might make evident who believes in the Hereafter from who is thereof in doubt. And your Lord, over all things, is Guardian.

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Invoke those you claim [as deities] besides Allah ." They do not possess an atom's weight [of ability] in the heavens or on the earth, and they do not have therein any partnership [with Him], nor is there for Him from among them any assistant.

Name: Saba
Verse: And intercession does not benefit with Him except for one whom He permits. [And those wait] until, when terror is removed from their hearts, they will say [to one another], "What has your Lord said?" They will say, "The truth." And He is the Most High, the Grand.

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?" Say, " Allah . And indeed, we or you are either upon guidance or in clear error."

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "You will not be asked about what we committed, and we will not be asked about what you do."

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "Our Lord will bring us together; then He will judge between us in truth. And He is the Knowing Judge."

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "Show me those whom you have attached to Him as partners. No! Rather, He [alone] is Allah , the Exalted in Might, the Wise."

Name: Saba
Verse: And We have not sent you except comprehensively to mankind as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. But most of the people do not know.

Name: Saba
Verse: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "For you is the appointment of a Day [when] you will not remain thereafter an hour, nor will you precede [it]."

Name: Saba
Verse: And those who disbelieve say, "We will never believe in this Qur'an nor in that before it." But if you could see when the wrongdoers are made to stand before their Lord, refuting each other's words... Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "If not for you, we would have been believers."

Name: Saba
Verse: Those who were arrogant will say to those who were oppressed, "Did we avert you from guidance after it had come to you? Rather, you were criminals."

Name: Saba
Verse: Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "Rather, [it was your] conspiracy of night and day when you were ordering us to disbelieve in Allah and attribute to Him equals." But they will [all] confide regret when they see the punishment; and We will put shackles on the necks of those who disbelieved. Will they be recompensed except for what they used to do?

Name: Saba
Verse: And We did not send into a city any warner except that its affluent said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers."

Name: Saba
Verse: And they said, "We are more [than the believers] in wealth and children, and we are not to be punished."

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it], but most of the people do not know."

Name: Saba
Verse: And it is not your wealth or your children that bring you nearer to Us in position, but it is [by being] one who has believed and done righteousness. For them there will be the double reward for what they did, and they will be in the upper chambers [of Paradise], safe [and secure].

Name: Saba
Verse: And the ones who strive against Our verses to cause [them] failure - those will be brought into the punishment [to remain].

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts [it] for him. But whatever thing you spend [in His cause] - He will compensate it; and He is the best of providers."

Name: Saba
Verse: And [mention] the Day when He will gather them all and then say to the angels, "Did these [people] used to worship you?"

Name: Saba
Verse: They will say, "Exalted are You! You, [O Allah ], are our benefactor not them. Rather, they used to worship the jinn; most of them were believers in them."

Name: Saba
Verse: But today you do not hold for one another [the power of] benefit or harm, and We will say to those who wronged, "Taste the punishment of the Fire, which you used to deny."

Name: Saba
Verse: And when our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, they say, "This is not but a man who wishes to avert you from that which your fathers were worshipping." And they say, "This is not except a lie invented." And those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is not but obvious magic."

Name: Saba
Verse: And We had not given them any scriptures which they could study, and We had not sent to them before you, [O Muhammad], any warner.

Name: Saba
Verse: And those before them denied, and the people of Makkah have not attained a tenth of what We had given them. But the former peoples denied My messengers, so how [terrible] was My reproach.

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "I only advise you of one [thing] - that you stand for Allah , [seeking truth] in pairs and individually, and then give thought." There is not in your companion any madness. He is only a warner to you before a severe punishment.

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "Whatever payment I might have asked of you - it is yours. My payment is only from Allah , and He is, over all things, Witness."

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "Indeed, my Lord projects the truth. Knower of the unseen."

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "The truth has come, and falsehood can neither begin [anything] nor repeat [it]."

Name: Saba
Verse: Say, "If I should err, I would only err against myself. But if I am guided, it is by what my Lord reveals to me. Indeed, He is Hearing and near."

Name: Saba
Verse: And if you could see when they are terrified but there is no escape, and they will be seized from a place nearby.

Name: Saba
Verse: And they will [then] say, "We believe in it!" But how for them will be the taking [of faith] from a place far away?

Name: Saba
Verse: And they had already disbelieved in it before and would assault the unseen from a place far away.

Name: Saba
Verse: And prevention will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their kind before. Indeed, they were in disquieting denial.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Whatever Allah grants to people of mercy - none can withhold it; and whatever He withholds - none can release it thereafter. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: The Angels
Verse: O mankind, remember the favor of Allah upon you. Is there any creator other than Allah who provides for you from the heaven and earth? There is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded?

Name: The Angels
Verse: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - already were messengers denied before you. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.

Name: The Angels
Verse: O mankind, indeed the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Indeed, Satan is an enemy to you; so take him as an enemy. He only invites his party to be among the companions of the Blaze.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Those who disbelieve will have a severe punishment, and those who believe and do righteous deeds will have forgiveness and great reward.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Then is one to whom the evil of his deed has been made attractive so he considers it good [like one rightly guided]? For indeed, Allah sends astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. So do not let yourself perish over them in regret. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what they do.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And it is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds, and We drive them to a dead land and give life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Thus is the resurrection.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Whoever desires honor [through power] - then to Allah belongs all honor. To Him ascends good speech, and righteous work raises it. But they who plot evil deeds will have a severe punishment, and the plotting of those - it will perish.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And Allah created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop; then He made you mates. And no female conceives nor does she give birth except with His knowledge. And no aged person is granted [additional] life nor is his lifespan lessened but that it is in a register. Indeed, that for Allah is easy.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And not alike are the two bodies of water. One is fresh and sweet, palatable for drinking, and one is salty and bitter. And from each you eat tender meat and extract ornaments which you wear, and you see the ships plowing through [them] that you might seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.

Name: The Angels
Verse: He causes the night to enter the day, and He causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon - each running [its course] for a specified term. That is Allah , your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. And those whom you invoke other than Him do not possess [as much as] the membrane of a date seed.

Name: The Angels
Verse: If you invoke them, they do not hear your supplication; and if they heard, they would not respond to you. And on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your association. And none can inform you like [one] Acquainted [with all matters].

Name: The Angels
Verse: O mankind, you are those in need of Allah , while Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

Name: The Angels
Verse: If He wills, He can do away with you and bring forth a new creation.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And that is for Allah not difficult.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And if a heavily laden soul calls [another] to [carry some of] its load, nothing of it will be carried, even if he should be a close relative. You can only warn those who fear their Lord unseen and have established prayer. And whoever purifies himself only purifies himself for [the benefit of] his soul. And to Allah is the [final] destination.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Not equal are the blind and the seeing,

Name: The Angels
Verse: Nor are the darknesses and the light,

Name: The Angels
Verse: Nor are the shade and the heat,

Name: The Angels
Verse: And not equal are the living and the dead. Indeed, Allah causes to hear whom He wills, but you cannot make hear those in the graves.

Name: The Angels
Verse: You, [O Muhammad], are not but a warner.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Indeed, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And there was no nation but that there had passed within it a warner.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And if they deny you - then already have those before them denied. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs and written ordinances and with the enlightening Scripture.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Then I seized the ones who disbelieved, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky, and We produce thereby fruits of varying colors? And in the mountains are tracts, white and red of varying shades and [some] extremely black.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And among people and moving creatures and grazing livestock are various colors similarly. Only those fear Allah , from among His servants, who have knowledge. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Forgiving.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Indeed, those who recite the Book of Allah and establish prayer and spend [in His cause] out of what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, [can] expect a profit that will never perish -

Name: The Angels
Verse: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And that which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], of the Book is the truth, confirming what was before it. Indeed, Allah , of His servants, is Acquainted and Seeing.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Then we caused to inherit the Book those We have chosen of Our servants; and among them is he who wrongs himself, and among them is he who is moderate, and among them is he who is foremost in good deeds by permission of Allah . That [inheritance] is what is the great bounty.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And they will say, "Praise to Allah , who has removed from us [all] sorrow. Indeed, our Lord is Forgiving and Appreciative -

Name: The Angels
Verse: He who has settled us in the home of duration out of His bounty. There touches us not in it any fatigue, and there touches us not in it weariness [of mind]."

Name: The Angels
Verse: And for those who disbelieve will be the fire of Hell. [Death] is not decreed for them so they may die, nor will its torment be lightened for them. Thus do we recompense every ungrateful one.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And they will cry out therein, "Our Lord, remove us; we will do righteousness - other than what we were doing!" But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you? So taste [the punishment], for there is not for the wrongdoers any helper.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Indeed, Allah is Knower of the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and earth. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

Name: The Angels
Verse: It is He who has made you successors upon the earth. And whoever disbelieves - upon him will be [the consequence of] his disbelief. And the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them in the sight of their Lord except in hatred; and the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them except in loss.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Say, "Have you considered your 'partners' whom you invoke besides Allah ? Show me what they have created from the earth, or have they partnership [with Him] in the heavens? Or have We given them a book so they are [standing] on evidence therefrom? [No], rather, the wrongdoers do not promise each other except delusion."

Name: The Angels
Verse: Indeed, Allah holds the heavens and the earth, lest they cease. And if they should cease, no one could hold them [in place] after Him. Indeed, He is Forbearing and Forgiving.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And they swore by Allah their strongest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than [any] one of the [previous] nations. But when a warner came to them, it did not increase them except in aversion.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? And they were greater than them in power. But Allah is not to be caused failure by anything in the heavens or on the earth. Indeed, He is ever Knowing and Competent.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for what they have earned, He would not leave upon the earth any creature. But He defers them for a specified term. And when their time comes, then indeed Allah has ever been, of His servants, Seeing.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Ya, Seen.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: By the wise Qur'an.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: On a straight path.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it -

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you."

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And we are not responsible except for clear notification."

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment."

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people."

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored."

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs -

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy... "

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error."

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth."

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: This is the Hellfire which you were promised.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: By those [angels] lined up in rows

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And those who drive [the clouds]

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And those who recite the message,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, your God is One,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And as protection against every rebellious devil

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But you wonder, while they mock,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And when they are reminded, they remember not.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And when they see a sign, they ridicule

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And our forefathers [as well]?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Other than Allah , and guide them to the path of Hellfire

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But they, that Day, are in surrender.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And they will approach one another blaming each other.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah ," were arrogant

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But not the chosen servants of Allah .

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Those will have a provision determined -

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Fruits; and they will be honored

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: In gardens of pleasure

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: On thrones facing one another.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: White and delicious to the drinkers;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: He will say, "By Allah , you almost ruined me.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then, are we not to die

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, this is the great attainment.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed they found their fathers astray.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We had already sent among them warners.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But not the chosen servants of Allah .

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: "Peace upon Noah among the worlds."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then We drowned the disbelievers.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And he cast a look at the stars

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So they turned away from him, departing.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then the people came toward him, hastening.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: While Allah created you and that which you do?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: We called to him, "O Abraham,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, this was the clear trial.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: "Peace upon Abraham."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We guided them on the straight path.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: "Peace upon Moses and Aaron."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah ?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Allah , your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Except the chosen servants of Allah .

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: "Peace upon Elias."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then We destroyed the others.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And at night. Then will you not use reason?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And he drew lots and was among the losers.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah ,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then will you not be reminded?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Or do you have a clear authority?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah ."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah ."

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And leave them for a time.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And see, for they are going to see.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And peace upon the messengers.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And praise to Allah , Lord of the worlds.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder...

Name: Sâd
Verse: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension.

Name: Sâd
Verse: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing."

Name: Sâd
Verse: And the eminent among them went forth, [saying], "Continue, and be patient over [the defense of] your gods. Indeed, this is a thing intended.

Name: Sâd
Verse: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower?

Name: Sâd
Verse: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend through [any] ways of access.

Name: Sâd
Verse: The people of Noah denied before them, and [the tribe of] 'Aad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes,

Name: Sâd
Verse: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And these [disbelievers] await not but one blast [of the Horn]; for it there will be no delay.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account"

Name: Sâd
Verse: Be patient over what they say and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; indeed, he was one who repeatedly turned back [to Allah ].

Name: Sâd
Verse: Indeed, We subjected the mountains [to praise] with him, exalting [ Allah ] in the [late] afternoon and [after] sunrise.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And the birds were assembled, all with him repeating [praises].

Name: Sâd
Verse: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And has there come to you the news of the adversaries, when they climbed over the wall of [his] prayer chamber -

Name: Sâd
Verse: When they entered upon David and he was alarmed by them? They said, "Fear not. [We are] two adversaries, one of whom has wronged the other, so judge between us with truth and do not exceed [it] and guide us to the sound path.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Indeed this, my brother, has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe; so he said, 'Entrust her to me,' and he overpowered me in speech."

Name: Sâd
Verse: So We forgave him that; and indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and that between them aimlessly. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve, so woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Or should we treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like corrupters in the land? Or should We treat those who fear Allah like the wicked?

Name: Sâd
Verse: And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah ].

Name: Sâd
Verse: And he said, "Indeed, I gave preference to the love of good [things] over the remembrance of my Lord until the sun disappeared into the curtain [of darkness]."

Name: Sâd
Verse: And We certainly tried Solomon and placed on his throne a body; then he returned.

Name: Sâd
Verse: He said, "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower."

Name: Sâd
Verse: So We subjected to him the wind blowing by his command, gently, wherever he directed,

Name: Sâd
Verse: And [also] the devils [of jinn] - every builder and diver

Name: Sâd
Verse: And others bound together in shackles.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, Satan has touched me with hardship and torment."

Name: Sâd
Verse: And We granted him his family and a like [number] with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and [religious] vision.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home [of the Hereafter].

Name: Sâd
Verse: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding.

Name: Sâd
Verse: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return

Name: Sâd
Verse: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Reclining within them, they will call therein for abundant fruit and drink.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances and of equal age.

Name: Sâd
Verse: This is what you, [the righteous], are promised for the Day of Account.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Indeed, this is Our provision; for it there is no depletion.

Name: Sâd
Verse: This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return -

Name: Sâd
Verse: Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the resting place.

Name: Sâd
Verse: This - so let them taste it - is scalding water and [foul] purulence.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And other [punishments] of its type [in various] kinds.

Name: Sâd
Verse: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, [our leaders], brought this upon us, and wretched is the settlement."

Name: Sâd
Verse: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire."

Name: Sâd
Verse: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst?

Name: Sâd
Verse: Is it [because] we took them in ridicule, or has [our] vision turned away from them?"

Name: Sâd
Verse: Indeed, that is truth - the quarreling of the people of the Fire.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except Allah , the One, the Prevailing.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver."

Name: Sâd
Verse: Say, "It is great news

Name: Sâd
Verse: From which you turn away.

Name: Sâd
Verse: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam].

Name: Sâd
Verse: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner."

Name: Sâd
Verse: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."

Name: Sâd
Verse: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Except Iblees; he was arrogant and became among the disbelievers.

Name: Sâd
Verse: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay."

Name: Sâd
Verse: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense."

Name: Sâd
Verse: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."

Name: Sâd
Verse: Until the Day of the time well-known."

Name: Sâd
Verse: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."

Name: Sâd
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for the Qur'an any payment, and I am not of the pretentious

Name: Sâd
Verse: It is but a reminder to the worlds.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And you will surely know [the truth of] its information after a time."

Name: The Troops
Verse: The revelation of the Qur'an is from Allah , the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Indeed, We have sent down to you the Book, [O Muhammad], in truth. So worship Allah , [being] sincere to Him in religion.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Unquestionably, for Allah is the pure religion. And those who take protectors besides Him [say], "We only worship them that they may bring us nearer to Allah in position." Indeed, Allah will judge between them concerning that over which they differ. Indeed, Allah does not guide he who is a liar and [confirmed] disbeliever.

Name: The Troops
Verse: If Allah had intended to take a son, He could have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed. Exalted is He; He is Allah , the One, the Prevailing.

Name: The Troops
Verse: He created the heavens and earth in truth. He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. Unquestionably, He is the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.

Name: The Troops
Verse: He created you from one soul. Then He made from it its mate, and He produced for you from the grazing livestock eight mates. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, within three darknesses. That is Allah , your Lord; to Him belongs dominion. There is no deity except Him, so how are you averted?

Name: The Troops
Verse: If you disbelieve - indeed, Allah is Free from need of you. And He does not approve for His servants disbelief. And if you are grateful, He approves it for you; and no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you about what you used to do. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to Him [alone]; then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself, he forgets Him whom he called upon before, and he attributes to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for a little; indeed, you are of the companions of the Fire."

Name: The Troops
Verse: Is one who is devoutly obedient during periods of the night, prostrating and standing [in prayer], fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, [like one who does not]? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Only they will remember [who are] people of understanding.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say, "O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world is good, and the earth of Allah is spacious. Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account."

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to worship Allah , [being] sincere to Him in religion.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] of the Muslims."

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say, " Allah [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,

Name: The Troops
Verse: So worship what you will besides Him." Say, "Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss."

Name: The Troops
Verse: They will have canopies of fire above them and below them, canopies. By that Allah threatens His servants. O My servants, then fear Me.

Name: The Troops
Verse: But those who have avoided Taghut, lest they worship it, and turned back to Allah - for them are good tidings. So give good tidings to My servants

Name: The Troops
Verse: Who listen to speech and follow the best of it. Those are the ones Allah has guided, and those are people of understanding.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Then, is one who has deserved the decree of punishment [to be guided]? Then, can you save one who is in the Fire?

Name: The Troops
Verse: But those who have feared their Lord - for them are chambers, above them chambers built high, beneath which rivers flow. [This is] the promise of Allah . Allah does not fail in [His] promise.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky and makes it flow as springs [and rivers] in the earth; then He produces thereby crops of varying colors; then they dry and you see them turned yellow; then He makes them [scattered] debris. Indeed in that is a reminder for those of understanding.

Name: The Troops
Verse: So is one whose breast Allah has expanded to [accept] Islam and he is upon a light from his Lord [like one whose heart rejects it]? Then woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the remembrance of Allah . Those are in manifest error.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Allah has sent down the best statement: a consistent Book wherein is reiteration. The skins shiver therefrom of those who fear their Lord; then their skins and their hearts relax at the remembrance of Allah . That is the guidance of Allah by which He guides whom He wills. And one whom Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Then is he who will shield with his face the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection [like one secure from it]? And it will be said to the wrongdoers, "Taste what you used to earn."

Name: The Troops
Verse: Those before them denied, and punishment came upon them from where they did not perceive.

Name: The Troops
Verse: So Allah made them taste disgrace in worldly life. But the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example - that they might remember.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Allah presents an example: a slave owned by quarreling partners and another belonging exclusively to one man - are they equal in comparison? Praise be to Allah ! But most of them do not know.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Indeed, you are to die, and indeed, they are to die.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord, will dispute.

Name: The Troops
Verse: So who is more unjust than one who lies about Allah and denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a residence for the disbelievers?

Name: The Troops
Verse: And the one who has brought the truth and [they who] believed in it - those are the righteous.

Name: The Troops
Verse: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of the doers of good -

Name: The Troops
Verse: That Allah may remove from them the worst of what they did and reward them their due for the best of what they used to do.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Is not Allah sufficient for His Servant [Prophet Muhammad]? And [yet], they threaten you with those [they worship] other than Him. And whoever Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And whoever Allah guides - for him there is no misleader. Is not Allah Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution?

Name: The Troops
Verse: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, " Allah ." Say, "Then have you considered what you invoke besides Allah ? If Allah intended me harm, are they removers of His harm; or if He intended me mercy, are they withholders of His mercy?" Say, "Sufficient for me is Allah ; upon Him [alone] rely the [wise] reliers."

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say, "O my people, work according to your position, [for] indeed, I am working; and you are going to know

Name: The Troops
Verse: To whom will come a torment disgracing him and on whom will descend an enduring punishment."

Name: The Troops
Verse: Indeed, We sent down to you the Book for the people in truth. So whoever is guided - it is for [the benefit of] his soul; and whoever goes astray only goes astray to its detriment. And you are not a manager over them.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Allah takes the souls at the time of their death, and those that do not die [He takes] during their sleep. Then He keeps those for which He has decreed death and releases the others for a specified term. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Or have they taken other than Allah as intercessors? Say, "Even though they do not possess [power over] anything, nor do they reason?"

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say, "To Allah belongs [the right to allow] intercession entirely. To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. Then to Him you will be returned."

Name: The Troops
Verse: And when Allah is mentioned alone, the hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter shrink with aversion, but when those [worshipped] other than Him are mentioned, immediately they rejoice.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say, "O Allah , Creator of the heavens and the earth, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, You will judge between your servants concerning that over which they used to differ."

Name: The Troops
Verse: And if those who did wrong had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would [attempt to] ransom themselves thereby from the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection. And there will appear to them from Allah that which they had not taken into account.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And there will appear to them the evils they had earned, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon Us; then when We bestow on him a favor from Us, he says, "I have only been given it because of [my] knowledge." Rather, it is a trial, but most of them do not know.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Those before them had already said it, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.

Name: The Troops
