Verse: And the evil consequences of what they earned struck them. And those who have wronged of these [people] will be afflicted by the evil consequences of what they earned; and they will not cause failure.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Do they not know that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say, "O My servants who have transgressed against themselves [by sinning], do not despair of the mercy of Allah . Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."

Name: The Troops
Verse: And return [in repentance] to your Lord and submit to Him before the punishment comes upon you; then you will not be helped.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And follow the best of what was revealed to you from your Lord before the punishment comes upon you suddenly while you do not perceive,

Name: The Troops
Verse: Lest a soul should say, "Oh [how great is] my regret over what I neglected in regard to Allah and that I was among the mockers."

Name: The Troops
Verse: Or [lest] it say, "If only Allah had guided me, I would have been among the righteous."

Name: The Troops
Verse: Or [lest] it say when it sees the punishment, "If only I had another turn so I could be among the doers of good."

Name: The Troops
Verse: But yes, there had come to you My verses, but you denied them and were arrogant, and you were among the disbelievers.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And on the Day of Resurrection you will see those who lied about Allah [with] their faces blackened. Is there not in Hell a residence for the arrogant?

Name: The Troops
Verse: And Allah will save those who feared Him by their attainment; no evil will touch them, nor will they grieve.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is, over all things, Disposer of affairs.

Name: The Troops
Verse: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. And they who disbelieve in the verses of Allah - it is those who are the losers.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Is it other than Allah that you order me to worship, O ignorant ones?"

Name: The Troops
Verse: And it was already revealed to you and to those before you that if you should associate [anything] with Allah , your work would surely become worthless, and you would surely be among the losers."

Name: The Troops
Verse: Rather, worship [only] Allah and be among the grateful.

Name: The Troops
Verse: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal, while the earth entirely will be [within] His grip on the Day of Resurrection, and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will fall dead except whom Allah wills. Then it will be blown again, and at once they will be standing, looking on.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And the earth will shine with the light of its Lord, and the record [of deeds] will be placed, and the prophets and the witnesses will be brought, and it will be judged between them in truth, and they will not be wronged.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And every soul will be fully compensated [for] what it did; and He is most knowing of what they do.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And those who disbelieved will be driven to Hell in groups until, when they reach it, its gates are opened and its keepers will say, "Did there not come to you messengers from yourselves, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours?" They will say, "Yes, but the word of punishment has come into effect upon the disbelievers.

Name: The Troops
Verse: But those who feared their Lord will be driven to Paradise in groups until, when they reach it while its gates have been opened and its keepers say, "Peace be upon you; you have become pure; so enter it to abide eternally therein," [they will enter].

Name: The Troops
Verse: And they will say, "Praise to Allah , who has fulfilled for us His promise and made us inherit the earth [so] we may settle in Paradise wherever we will. And excellent is the reward of [righteous] workers."

Name: The Troops
Verse: And you will see the angels surrounding the Throne, exalting [ Allah ] with praise of their Lord. And it will be judged between them in truth, and it will be said, "[All] praise to Allah , Lord of the worlds."

Name: The Believer
Verse: Ha, Meem.

Name: The Believer
Verse: The revelation of the Book is from Allah , the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

Name: The Believer
Verse: The forgiver of sin, acceptor of repentance, severe in punishment, owner of abundance. There is no deity except Him; to Him is the destination.

Name: The Believer
Verse: No one disputes concerning the signs of Allah except those who disbelieve, so be not deceived by their [uninhibited] movement throughout the land.

Name: The Believer
Verse: The people of Noah denied before them and the [disbelieving] factions after them, and every nation intended [a plot] for their messenger to seize him, and they disputed by [using] falsehood to [attempt to] invalidate thereby the truth. So I seized them, and how [terrible] was My penalty.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And thus has the word of your Lord come into effect upon those who disbelieved that they are companions of the Fire.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Those [angels] who carry the Throne and those around it exalt [ Allah ] with praise of their Lord and believe in Him and ask forgiveness for those who have believed, [saying], "Our Lord, You have encompassed all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive those who have repented and followed Your way and protect them from the punishment of Hellfire.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Our Lord, and admit them to gardens of perpetual residence which You have promised them and whoever was righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their offspring. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And protect them from the evil consequences [of their deeds]. And he whom You protect from evil consequences that Day - You will have given him mercy. And that is the great attainment."

Name: The Believer
Verse: Indeed, those who disbelieve will be addressed, "The hatred of Allah for you was [even] greater than your hatred of yourselves [this Day in Hell] when you were invited to faith, but you refused."

Name: The Believer
Verse: They will say, "Our Lord, You made us lifeless twice and gave us life twice, and we have confessed our sins. So is there to an exit any way?"

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down to you from the sky, provision. But none will remember except he who turns back [in repentance].

Name: The Believer
Verse: So invoke Allah , [being] sincere to Him in religion, although the disbelievers dislike it.

Name: The Believer
Verse: The Day they come forth nothing concerning them will be concealed from Allah . To whom belongs [all] sovereignty this Day? To Allah , the One, the Prevailing.

Name: The Believer
Verse: This Day every soul will be recompensed for what it earned. No injustice today! Indeed, Allah is swift in account.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Approaching Day, when hearts are at the throats, filled [with distress]. For the wrongdoers there will be no devoted friend and no intercessor [who is] obeyed.

Name: The Believer
Verse: He knows that which deceives the eyes and what the breasts conceal.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And Allah judges with truth, while those they invoke besides Him judge not with anything. Indeed, Allah - He is the Hearing, the Seeing.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those who were before them? They were greater than them in strength and in impression on the land, but Allah seized them for their sins. And they had not from Allah any protector.

Name: The Believer
Verse: That was because their messengers were coming to them with clear proofs, but they disbelieved, so Allah seized them. Indeed, He is Powerful and severe in punishment.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority

Name: The Believer
Verse: To Pharaoh, Haman and Qarun; but they said, "[He is] a magician and a liar."

Name: The Believer
Verse: And when he brought them the truth from Us, they said, "Kill the sons of those who have believed with him and keep their women alive." But the plan of the disbelievers is not except in error.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses and let him call upon his Lord. Indeed, I fear that he will change your religion or that he will cause corruption in the land."

Name: The Believer
Verse: But Moses said, "Indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Account."

Name: The Believer
Verse: And a believing man from the family of Pharaoh who concealed his faith said, "Do you kill a man [merely] because he says, 'My Lord is Allah ' while he has brought you clear proofs from your Lord? And if he should be lying, then upon him is [the consequence of] his lie; but if he should be truthful, there will strike you some of what he promises you. Indeed, Allah does not guide one who is a transgressor and a liar.

Name: The Believer
Verse: O my people, sovereignty is yours today, [your being] dominant in the land. But who would protect us from the punishment of Allah if it came to us?" Pharaoh said, "I do not show you except what I see, and I do not guide you except to the way of right conduct."

Name: The Believer
Verse: And he who believed said, "O my people, indeed I fear for you [a fate] like the day of the companies -

Name: The Believer
Verse: Like the custom of the people of Noah and of 'Aad and Thamud and those after them. And Allah wants no injustice for [His] servants.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And O my people, indeed I fear for you the Day of Calling -

Name: The Believer
Verse: The Day you will turn your backs fleeing; there is not for you from Allah any protector. And whoever Allah leaves astray - there is not for him any guide.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And Joseph had already come to you before with clear proofs, but you remained in doubt of that which he brought to you, until when he died, you said, 'Never will Allah send a messenger after him.' Thus does Allah leave astray he who is a transgressor and skeptic."

Name: The Believer
Verse: Those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without an authority having come to them - great is hatred [of them] in the sight of Allah and in the sight of those who have believed. Thus does Allah seal over every heart [belonging to] an arrogant tyrant.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And Pharaoh said, "O Haman, construct for me a tower that I might reach the ways -

Name: The Believer
Verse: The ways into the heavens - so that I may look at the deity of Moses; but indeed, I think he is a liar." And thus was made attractive to Pharaoh the evil of his deed, and he was averted from the [right] way. And the plan of Pharaoh was not except in ruin.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And he who believed said, "O my people, follow me, I will guide you to the way of right conduct.

Name: The Believer
Verse: O my people, this worldly life is only [temporary] enjoyment, and indeed, the Hereafter - that is the home of [permanent] settlement.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Whoever does an evil deed will not be recompensed except by the like thereof; but whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - those will enter Paradise, being given provision therein without account.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And O my people, how is it that I invite you to salvation while you invite me to the Fire?

Name: The Believer
Verse: You invite me to disbelieve in Allah and associate with Him that of which I have no knowledge, and I invite you to the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Assuredly, that to which you invite me has no [response to a] supplication in this world or in the Hereafter; and indeed, our return is to Allah , and indeed, the transgressors will be companions of the Fire.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah . Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants."

Name: The Believer
Verse: So Allah protected him from the evils they plotted, and the people of Pharaoh were enveloped by the worst of punishment -

Name: The Believer
Verse: The Fire, they are exposed to it morning and evening. And the Day the Hour appears [it will be said], "Make the people of Pharaoh enter the severest punishment."

Name: The Believer
Verse: And [mention] when they will argue within the Fire, and the weak will say to those who had been arrogant, "Indeed, we were [only] your followers, so will you relieve us of a share of the Fire?"

Name: The Believer
Verse: Those who had been arrogant will say, "Indeed, all [of us] are in it. Indeed, Allah has judged between the servants."

Name: The Believer
Verse: And those in the Fire will say to the keepers of Hell, "Supplicate your Lord to lighten for us a day from the punishment."

Name: The Believer
Verse: They will say, "Did there not come to you your messengers with clear proofs?" They will say, "Yes." They will reply, "Then supplicate [yourselves], but the supplication of the disbelievers is not except in error."

Name: The Believer
Verse: Indeed, We will support Our messengers and those who believe during the life of this world and on the Day when the witnesses will stand -

Name: The Believer
Verse: The Day their excuse will not benefit the wrongdoers, and they will have the curse, and they will have the worst home.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And We had certainly given Moses guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture

Name: The Believer
Verse: As guidance and a reminder for those of understanding.

Name: The Believer
Verse: So be patient, [O Muhammad]. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And ask forgiveness for your sin and exalt [ Allah ] with praise of your Lord in the evening and the morning.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Indeed, those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without [any] authority having come to them - there is not within their breasts except pride, [the extent of] which they cannot reach. So seek refuge in Allah . Indeed, it is He who is the Hearing, the Seeing.

Name: The Believer
Verse: The creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of mankind, but most of the people do not know.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And not equal are the blind and the seeing, nor are those who believe and do righteous deeds and the evildoer. Little do you remember.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Indeed, the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - but most of the people do not believe.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And your Lord says, "Call upon Me; I will respond to you." Indeed, those who disdain My worship will enter Hell [rendered] contemptible.

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is Allah who made for you the night that you may rest therein and the day giving sight. Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of the people are not grateful.

Name: The Believer
Verse: That is Allah , your Lord, Creator of all things; there is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded?

Name: The Believer
Verse: Thus were those [before you] deluded who were rejecting the signs of Allah .

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is Allah who made for you the earth a place of settlement and the sky a ceiling and formed you and perfected your forms and provided you with good things. That is Allah , your Lord; then blessed is Allah , Lord of the worlds.

Name: The Believer
Verse: He is the Ever-Living; there is no deity except Him, so call upon Him, [being] sincere to Him in religion. [All] praise is [due] to Allah , Lord of the worlds.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been forbidden to worship those you call upon besides Allah once the clear proofs have come to me from my Lord, and I have been commanded to submit to the Lord of the worlds."

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is He who created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [time of] maturity, then [further] that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a specified term; and perhaps you will use reason.

Name: The Believer
Verse: He it is who gives life and causes death; and when He decrees a matter, He but says to it, "Be," and it is.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Do you not consider those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah - how are they averted?

Name: The Believer
Verse: Those who deny the Book and that with which We sent Our messengers - they are going to know,

Name: The Believer
Verse: When the shackles are around their necks and the chains; they will be dragged

Name: The Believer
Verse: In boiling water; then in the Fire they will be filled [with flame].

Name: The Believer
Verse: Then it will be said to them, "Where is that which you used to associate [with Him in worship]

Name: The Believer
Verse: Other than Allah ?" They will say, "They have departed from us; rather, we did not used to invoke previously anything." Thus does Allah put astray the disbelievers.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant."

Name: The Believer
Verse: So be patient, [O Muhammad]; indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And whether We show you some of what We have promised them or We take you in death, it is to Us they will be returned.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And We have already sent messengers before you. Among them are those [whose stories] We have related to you, and among them are those [whose stories] We have not related to you. And it was not for any messenger to bring a sign [or verse] except by permission of Allah . So when the command of Allah comes, it will be concluded in truth, and the falsifiers will thereupon lose [all].

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is Allah who made for you the grazing animals upon which you ride, and some of them you eat.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And for you therein are [other] benefits and that you may realize upon them a need which is in your breasts; and upon them and upon ships you are carried.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And He shows you His signs. So which of the signs of Allah do you deny?

Name: The Believer
Verse: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? They were more numerous than themselves and greater in strength and in impression on the land, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And when their messengers came to them with clear proofs, they [merely] rejoiced in what they had of knowledge, but they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And when they saw Our punishment, they said," We believe in Allah alone and disbelieve in that which we used to associate with Him."

Name: The Believer
Verse: But never did their faith benefit them once they saw Our punishment. [It is] the established way of Allah which has preceded among His servants. And the disbelievers thereupon lost [all].

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Ha, Meem.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: A Book whose verses have been detailed, an Arabic Qur'an for a people who know,

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: As a giver of good tidings and a warner; but most of them turn away, so they do not hear.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And they say, "Our hearts are within coverings from that to which you invite us, and in our ears is deafness, and between us and you is a partition, so work; indeed, we are working."

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Say, O [Muhammad], "I am only a man like you to whom it has been revealed that your god is but one God; so take a straight course to Him and seek His forgiveness." And woe to those who associate others with Allah -

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Those who do not give zakah, and in the Hereafter they are disbelievers.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them is a reward uninterrupted.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Say, "Do you indeed disbelieve in He who created the earth in two days and attribute to Him equals? That is the Lord of the worlds."

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And He placed on the earth firmly set mountains over its surface, and He blessed it and determined therein its [creatures'] sustenance in four days without distinction - for [the information] of those who ask.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Then He directed Himself to the heaven while it was smoke and said to it and to the earth, "Come [into being], willingly or by compulsion." They said, "We have come willingly."

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And He completed them as seven heavens within two days and inspired in each heaven its command. And We adorned the nearest heaven with lamps and as protection. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: But if they turn away, then say, "I have warned you of a thunderbolt like the thunderbolt [that struck] 'Aad and Thamud.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: As for 'Aad, they were arrogant upon the earth without right and said, "Who is greater than us in strength?" Did they not consider that Allah who created them was greater than them in strength? But they were rejecting Our signs.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: So We sent upon them a screaming wind during days of misfortune to make them taste the punishment of disgrace in the worldly life; but the punishment of the Hereafter is more disgracing, and they will not be helped.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And as for Thamud, We guided them, but they preferred blindness over guidance, so the thunderbolt of humiliating punishment seized them for what they used to earn.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah .

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And [mention, O Muhammad], the Day when the enemies of Allah will be gathered to the Fire while they are [driven] assembled in rows,

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Until, when they reach it, their hearing and their eyes and their skins will testify against them of what they used to do.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And they will say to their skins, "Why have you testified against us?" They will say, "We were made to speak by Allah , who has made everything speak; and He created you the first time, and to Him you are returned.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And you were not covering yourselves, lest your hearing testify against you or your sight or your skins, but you assumed that Allah does not know much of what you do.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And that was your assumption which you assumed about your Lord. It has brought you to ruin, and you have become among the losers."

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: So [even] if they are patient, the Fire is a residence for them; and if they ask to appease [ Allah ], they will not be of those who are allowed to appease.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And We appointed for them companions who made attractive to them what was before them and what was behind them [of sin], and the word has come into effect upon them among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they [all] were losers.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And those who disbelieve say, "Do not listen to this Qur'an and speak noisily during [the recitation of] it that perhaps you will overcome."

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: But We will surely cause those who disbelieve to taste a severe punishment, and We will surely recompense them for the worst of what they had been doing.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: That is the recompense of the enemies of Allah - the Fire. For them therein is the home of eternity as recompense for what they, of Our verses, were rejecting.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And those who disbelieved will [then] say, "Our Lord, show us those who misled us of the jinn and men [so] we may put them under our feet that they will be among the lowest."

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Indeed, those who have said, "Our Lord is Allah " and then remained on a right course - the angels will descend upon them, [saying], "Do not fear and do not grieve but receive good tidings of Paradise, which you were promised.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: We [angels] were your allies in worldly life and [are so] in the Hereafter. And you will have therein whatever your souls desire, and you will have therein whatever you request [or wish]

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: As accommodation from a [Lord who is] Forgiving and Merciful."

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And who is better in speech than one who invites to Allah and does righteousness and says, "Indeed, I am of the Muslims."

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And not equal are the good deed and the bad. Repel [evil] by that [deed] which is better; and thereupon the one whom between you and him is enmity [will become] as though he was a devoted friend.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: But none is granted it except those who are patient, and none is granted it except one having a great portion [of good].

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And if there comes to you from Satan an evil suggestion, then seek refuge in Allah . Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And of His signs are the night and day and the sun and moon. Do not prostrate to the sun or to the moon, but prostate to Allah , who created them, if it should be Him that you worship.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: But if they are arrogant - then those who are near your Lord exalt Him by night and by day, and they do not become weary.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And of His signs is that you see the earth stilled, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and grows. Indeed, He who has given it life is the Giver of Life to the dead. Indeed, He is over all things competent.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Indeed, those who inject deviation into Our verses are not concealed from Us. So, is he who is cast into the Fire better or he who comes secure on the Day of Resurrection? Do whatever you will; indeed, He is Seeing of what you do.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Indeed, those who disbelieve in the message after it has come to them... And indeed, it is a mighty Book.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Falsehood cannot approach it from before it or from behind it; [it is] a revelation from a [Lord who is] Wise and Praiseworthy.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Nothing is said to you, [O Muhammad], except what was already said to the messengers before you. Indeed, your Lord is a possessor of forgiveness and a possessor of painful penalty.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And if We had made it a non-Arabic Qur'an, they would have said, "Why are its verses not explained in detail [in our language]? Is it a foreign [recitation] and an Arab [messenger]?" Say, "It is, for those who believe, a guidance and cure." And those who do not believe - in their ears is deafness, and it is upon them blindness. Those are being called from a distant place.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And We had already given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Whoever does righteousness - it is for his [own] soul; and whoever does evil [does so] against it. And your Lord is not ever unjust to [His] servants.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: To him [alone] is attributed knowledge of the Hour. And fruits emerge not from their coverings nor does a female conceive or give birth except with His knowledge. And the Day He will call to them, "Where are My 'partners'?" they will say, "We announce to You that there is [no longer] among us any witness [to that]."

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And lost from them will be those they were invoking before, and they will be certain that they have no place of escape.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Man is not weary of supplication for good [things], but if evil touches him, he is hopeless and despairing.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And if We let him taste mercy from Us after an adversity which has touched him, he will surely say, "This is [due] to me, and I do not think the Hour will occur; and [even] if I should be returned to my Lord, indeed, for me there will be with Him the best." But We will surely inform those who disbelieved about what they did, and We will surely make them taste a massive punishment.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And when We bestow favor upon man, he turns away and distances himself; but when evil touches him, then he is full of extensive supplication.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Say, "Have you considered: if the Qur'an is from Allah and you disbelieved in it, who would be more astray than one who is in extreme dissension?"

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: We will show them Our signs in the horizons and within themselves until it becomes clear to them that it is the truth. But is it not sufficient concerning your Lord that He is, over all things, a Witness?

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Unquestionably, they are in doubt about the meeting with their Lord. Unquestionably He is, of all things, encompassing.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Ha, Meem.

Name: Counsel
Verse: 'Ayn, Seen, Qaf.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Thus has He revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and to those before you - Allah , the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: Counsel
Verse: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and He is the Most High, the Most Great.

Name: Counsel
Verse: The heavens almost break from above them, and the angels exalt [ Allah ] with praise of their Lord and ask forgiveness for those on earth. Unquestionably, it is Allah who is the Forgiving, the Merciful.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And those who take as allies other than Him - Allah is [yet] Guardian over them; and you, [O Muhammad], are not over them a manager.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And thus We have revealed to you an Arabic Qur'an that you may warn the Mother of Cities [Makkah] and those around it and warn of the Day of Assembly, about which there is no doubt. A party will be in Paradise and a party in the Blaze.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And if Allah willed, He could have made them [of] one religion, but He admits whom He wills into His mercy. And the wrongdoers have not any protector or helper.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Or have they taken protectors [or allies] besides him? But Allah - He is the Protector, and He gives life to the dead, and He is over all things competent.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And in anything over which you disagree - its ruling is [to be referred] to Allah . [Say], "That is Allah , my Lord; upon Him I have relied, and to Him I turn back."

Name: Counsel
Verse: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. He extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is, of all things, Knowing.

Name: Counsel
Verse: He has ordained for you of religion what He enjoined upon Noah and that which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what We enjoined upon Abraham and Moses and Jesus - to establish the religion and not be divided therein. Difficult for those who associate others with Allah is that to which you invite them. Allah chooses for Himself whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him].

Name: Counsel
Verse: And they did not become divided until after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord [postponing the penalty] until a specified time, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed, those who were granted inheritance of the Scripture after them are, concerning it, in disquieting doubt.

Name: Counsel
Verse: So to that [religion of Allah ] invite, [O Muhammad], and remain on a right course as you are commanded and do not follow their inclinations but say, "I have believed in what Allah has revealed of the Qur'an, and I have been commanded to do justice among you. Allah is our Lord and your Lord. For us are our deeds, and for you your deeds. There is no [need for] argument between us and you. Allah will bring us together, and to Him is the [final] destination."

Name: Counsel
Verse: And those who argue concerning Allah after He has been responded to - their argument is invalid with their Lord, and upon them is [His] wrath, and for them is a severe punishment.

Name: Counsel
Verse: It is Allah who has sent down the Book in truth and [also] the balance. And what will make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Those who do not believe in it are impatient for it, but those who believe are fearful of it and know that it is the truth. Unquestionably, those who dispute concerning the Hour are in extreme error.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Allah is Subtle with His servants; He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Whoever desires the harvest of the Hereafter - We increase for him in his harvest. And whoever desires the harvest of this world - We give him thereof, but there is not for him in the Hereafter any share.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Or have they other deities who have ordained for them a religion to which Allah has not consented? But if not for the decisive word, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed, the wrongdoers will have a painful punishment.

Name: Counsel
Verse: You will see the wrongdoers fearful of what they have earned, and it will [certainly] befall them. And those who have believed and done righteous deeds will be in lush regions of the gardens [in Paradise] having whatever they will in the presence of their Lord. That is what is the great bounty.

Name: Counsel
Verse: It is that of which Allah gives good tidings to His servants who believe and do righteous deeds. Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for this message any payment [but] only good will through kinship." And whoever commits a good deed - We will increase for him good therein. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Appreciative.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Or do they say, "He has invented about Allah a lie"? But if Allah willed, He could seal over your heart. And Allah eliminates falsehood and establishes the truth by His words. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And it is He who accepts repentance from his servants and pardons misdeeds, and He knows what you do.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And He answers [the supplication of] those who have believed and done righteous deeds and increases [for] them from His bounty. But the disbelievers will have a severe punishment.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And if Allah had extended [excessively] provision for His servants, they would have committed tyranny throughout the earth. But He sends [it] down in an amount which He wills. Indeed He is, of His servants, Acquainted and Seeing.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And it is He who sends down the rain after they had despaired and spreads His mercy. And He is the Protector, the Praiseworthy.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And of his signs is the creation of the heavens and earth and what He has dispersed throughout them of creatures. And He, for gathering them when He wills, is competent.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And whatever strikes you of disaster - it is for what your hands have earned; but He pardons much.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And you will not cause failure [to Allah ] upon the earth. And you have not besides Allah any protector or helper.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And of His signs are the ships in the sea, like mountains.

Name: Counsel
Verse: If He willed, He could still the wind, and they would remain motionless on its surface. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Or He could destroy them for what they earned; but He pardons much.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And [that is so] those who dispute concerning Our signs may know that for them there is no place of escape.

Name: Counsel
Verse: So whatever thing you have been given - it is but [for] enjoyment of the worldly life. But what is with Allah is better and more lasting for those who have believed and upon their Lord rely

Name: Counsel
Verse: And those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, and when they are angry, they forgive,

Name: Counsel
Verse: And those who have responded to their lord and established prayer and whose affair is [determined by] consultation among themselves, and from what We have provided them, they spend.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And those who, when tyranny strikes them, they defend themselves,

Name: Counsel
Verse: And the retribution for an evil act is an evil one like it, but whoever pardons and makes reconciliation - his reward is [due] from Allah . Indeed, He does not like wrongdoers.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And whoever avenges himself after having been wronged - those have not upon them any cause [for blame].

Name: Counsel
Verse: The cause is only against the ones who wrong the people and tyrannize upon the earth without right. Those will have a painful punishment.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And whoever is patient and forgives - indeed, that is of the matters [requiring] determination.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And he whom Allah sends astray - for him there is no protector beyond Him. And you will see the wrongdoers, when they see the punishment, saying, "Is there for return [to the former world] any way?"

Name: Counsel
Verse: And you will see them being exposed to the Fire, humbled from humiliation, looking from [behind] a covert glance. And those who had believed will say, "Indeed, the [true] losers are the ones who lost themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, the wrongdoers are in an enduring punishment."

Name: Counsel
Verse: And there will not be for them any allies to aid them other than Allah . And whoever Allah sends astray - for him there is no way.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Respond to your Lord before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. No refuge will you have that day, nor for you will there be any denial.

Name: Counsel
Verse: But if they turn away - then We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a guardian; upon you is only [the duty of] notification. And indeed, when We let man taste mercy from us, he rejoices in it; but if evil afflicts him for what his hands have put forth, then indeed, man is ungrateful.

Name: Counsel
Verse: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; He creates what he wills. He gives to whom He wills female [children], and He gives to whom He wills males.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Or He makes them [both] males and females, and He renders whom He wills barren. Indeed, He is Knowing and Competent.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And it is not for any human being that Allah should speak to him except by revelation or from behind a partition or that He sends a messenger to reveal, by His permission, what He wills. Indeed, He is Most High and Wise.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And thus We have revealed to you an inspiration of Our command. You did not know what is the Book or [what is] faith, but We have made it a light by which We guide whom We will of Our servants. And indeed, [O Muhammad], you guide to a straight path -

Name: Counsel
Verse: The path of Allah , to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Unquestionably, to Allah do [all] matters evolve.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Ha, Meem.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: By the clear Book,

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Indeed, We have made it an Arabic Qur'an that you might understand.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And indeed it is, in the Mother of the Book with Us, exalted and full of wisdom.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Then should We turn the message away, disregarding you, because you are a transgressing people?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And how many a prophet We sent among the former peoples,

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: But there would not come to them a prophet except that they used to ridicule him.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And We destroyed greater than them in [striking] power, and the example of the former peoples has preceded.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And if you should ask them, "Who has created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "They were created by the Exalted in Might, the Knowing."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And who sends down rain from the sky in measured amounts, and We revive thereby a dead land - thus will you be brought forth -

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And who created the species, all of them, and has made for you of ships and animals those which you mount.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: That you may settle yourselves upon their backs and then remember the favor of your Lord when you have settled upon them and say. "Exalted is He who has subjected this to us, and we could not have [otherwise] subdued it.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And indeed we, to our Lord, will [surely] return."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: But they have attributed to Him from His servants a portion. Indeed, man is clearly ungrateful.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or has He taken, out of what He has created, daughters and chosen you for [having] sons?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And when one of them is given good tidings of that which he attributes to the Most Merciful in comparison, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: So is one brought up in ornaments while being during conflict unevident [attributed to Allah ]?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And they have made the angels, who are servants of the Most Merciful, females. Did they witness their creation? Their testimony will be recorded, and they will be questioned.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And they said, "If the Most Merciful had willed, we would not have worshipped them." They have of that no knowledge. They are not but falsifying.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or have We given them a book before the Qur'an to which they are adhering?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Rather, they say, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are in their footsteps [rightly] guided."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And similarly, We did not send before you any warner into a city except that its affluent said, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are, in their footsteps, following."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: So we took retribution from them; then see how was the end of the deniers.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said to his father and his people, "Indeed, I am disassociated from that which you worship

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Except for He who created me; and indeed, He will guide me."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And he made it a word remaining among his descendants that they might return [to it].

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: However, I gave enjoyment to these [people of Makkah] and their fathers until there came to them the truth and a clear Messenger.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: But when the truth came to them, they said, "This is magic, and indeed we are, concerning it, disbelievers."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And they said, "Why was this Qur'an not sent down upon a great man from [one of] the two cities?"

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Do they distribute the mercy of your Lord? It is We who have apportioned among them their livelihood in the life of this world and have raised some of them above others in degrees [of rank] that they may make use of one another for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than whatever they accumulate.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And if it were not that the people would become one community [of disbelievers], We would have made for those who disbelieve in the Most Merciful - for their houses - ceilings and stairways of silver upon which to mount

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And for their houses - doors and couches [of silver] upon which to recline

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And gold ornament. But all that is not but the enjoyment of worldly life. And the Hereafter with your Lord is for the righteous.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And whoever is blinded from remembrance of the Most Merciful - We appoint for him a devil, and he is to him a companion.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And indeed, the devils avert them from the way [of guidance] while they think that they are [rightly] guided

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Until, when he comes to Us [at Judgement], he says [to his companion], "Oh, I wish there was between me and you the distance between the east and west - how wretched a companion."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And never will it benefit you that Day, when you have wronged, that you are [all] sharing in the punishment.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Then will you make the deaf hear, [O Muhammad], or guide the blind or he who is in clear error?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And whether [or not] We take you away [in death], indeed, We will take retribution upon them.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or whether [or not] We show you that which We have promised them, indeed, We are Perfect in Ability.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: So adhere to that which is revealed to you. Indeed, you are on a straight path.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And indeed, it is a remembrance for you and your people, and you [all] are going to be questioned.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And ask those We sent before you of Our messengers; have We made besides the Most Merciful deities to be worshipped?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And certainly did We send Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his establishment, and he said, "Indeed, I am the messenger of the Lord of the worlds."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: But when he brought them Our signs, at once they laughed at them.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And We showed them not a sign except that it was greater than its sister, and We seized them with affliction that perhaps they might return [to faith].

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And they said [to Moses], "O magician, invoke for us your Lord by what He has promised you. Indeed, we will be guided."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: But when We removed from them the affliction, at once they broke their word.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And Pharaoh called out among his people; he said, "O my people, does not the kingdom of Egypt belong to me, and these rivers flowing beneath me; then do you not see?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or am I [not] better than this one who is insignificant and hardly makes himself clear?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Then why have there not been placed upon him bracelets of gold or come with him the angels in conjunction?"

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: So he bluffed his people, and they obeyed him. Indeed, they were [themselves] a people defiantly disobedient [of Allah ].

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And when they angered Us, We took retribution from them and drowned them all.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And We made them a precedent and an example for the later peoples.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And when the son of Mary was presented as an example, immediately your people laughed aloud.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And they said, "Are your gods better, or is he?" They did not present the comparison except for [mere] argument. But, [in fact], they are a people prone to dispute.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Jesus was not but a servant upon whom We bestowed favor, and We made him an example for the Children of Israel.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And if We willed, We could have made [instead] of you angels succeeding [one another] on the earth.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And indeed, Jesus will be [a sign for] knowledge of the Hour, so be not in doubt of it, and follow Me. This is a straight path.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And never let Satan avert you. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And when Jesus brought clear proofs, he said, "I have come to you with wisdom and to make clear to you some of that over which you differ, so fear Allah and obey me.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: But the denominations from among them differed [and separated], so woe to those who have wronged from the punishment of a painful Day.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Are they waiting except for the Hour to come upon them suddenly while they perceive not?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Close friends, that Day, will be enemies to each other, except for the righteous

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Enter Paradise, you and your kinds, delighted."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Circulated among them will be plates and vessels of gold. And therein is whatever the souls desire and [what] delights the eyes, and you will abide therein eternally.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And that is Paradise which you are made to inherit for what you used to do.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: For you therein is much fruit from which you will eat.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Indeed, the criminals will be in the punishment of Hell, abiding eternally.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: It will not be allowed to subside for them, and they, therein, are in despair.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And they will call, "O Malik, let your Lord put an end to us!" He will say, "Indeed, you will remain."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: We had certainly brought you the truth, but most of you, to the truth, were averse.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or have they devised [some] affair? But indeed, We are devising [a plan].

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private conversations? Yes, [We do], and Our messengers are with them recording.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "If the Most Merciful had a son, then I would be the first of [his] worshippers."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Exalted is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And it is Allah who is [the only] deity in the heaven, and on the earth [the only] deity. And He is the Wise, the Knowing.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And blessed is He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them and with whom is knowledge of the Hour and to whom you will be returned.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And those they invoke besides Him do not possess [power of] intercession; but only those who testify to the truth [can benefit], and they know.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And if you asked them who created them, they would surely say, " Allah ." So how are they deluded?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And [ Allah acknowledges] his saying, "O my Lord, indeed these are a people who do not believe."

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: So turn aside from them and say, "Peace." But they are going to know.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Ha, Meem.

Name: Smoke
Verse: By the clear Book,

Name: Smoke
Verse: Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night. Indeed, We were to warn [mankind].

Name: Smoke
Verse: On that night is made distinct every precise matter -

Name: Smoke
Verse: As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain.

Name: Smoke
Verse: There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers.

Name: Smoke
Verse: But they are in doubt, amusing themselves.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Covering the people; this is a painful torment.

Name: Smoke
Verse: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman."

Name: Smoke
Verse: Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief].

Name: Smoke
Verse: The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution.

Name: Smoke
Verse: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger,

Name: Smoke
Verse: And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allah . Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority.

Name: Smoke
Verse: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.

Name: Smoke
Verse: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone."

Name: Smoke
Verse: And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people.

Name: Smoke
Verse: And leave the sea in stillness. Indeed, they are an army to be drowned."

Name: Smoke
Verse: How much they left behind of gardens and springs

Name: Smoke
Verse: And crops and noble sites

Name: Smoke
Verse: And comfort wherein they were amused.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people.

Name: Smoke
Verse: And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved.

Name: Smoke
Verse: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment -

Name: Smoke
Verse: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors.

Name: Smoke
Verse: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds.

Name: Smoke
Verse: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Indeed, these [disbelievers] are saying,

Name: Smoke
Verse: "There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Then bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."

Name: Smoke
Verse: Are they better or the people of Tubba' and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] indeed, they were criminals.

Name: Smoke
Verse: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play.

Name: Smoke
Verse: We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all -

Name: Smoke
Verse: The Day when no relation will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped -

Name: Smoke
Verse: Except those [believers] on whom Allah has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Indeed, the tree of zaqqum

Name: Smoke
Verse: Is food for the sinful.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies

Name: Smoke
Verse: Like the boiling of scalding water.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water."

Name: Smoke
Verse: Indeed, this is what you used to dispute."

Name: Smoke
Verse: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place;

Name: Smoke
Verse: Within gardens and springs,

Name: Smoke
Verse: Wearing [garments of] fine silk and brocade, facing each other.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

Name: Smoke
Verse: They will call therein for every [kind of] fruit - safe and secure.

Name: Smoke
Verse: They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

Name: Smoke
Verse: As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment.

Name: Smoke
Verse: And indeed, We have eased the Qur'an in your tongue that they might be reminded.

Name: Smoke
Verse: So watch, [O Muhammad]; indeed, they are watching [for your end].

Name: Crouching
Verse: Ha, Meem.

Name: Crouching
Verse: The revelation of the Book is from Allah , the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Indeed, within the heavens and earth are signs for the believers.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And in the creation of yourselves and what He disperses of moving creatures are signs for people who are certain [in faith].

Name: Crouching
Verse: And [in] the alternation of night and day and [in] what Allah sends down from the sky of provision and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness and [in His] directing of the winds are signs for a people who reason.

Name: Crouching
Verse: These are the verses of Allah which We recite to you in truth. Then in what statement after Allah and His verses will they believe?

Name: Crouching
Verse: Woe to every sinful liar

Name: Crouching
Verse: Who hears the verses of Allah recited to him, then persists arrogantly as if he had not heard them. So give him tidings of a painful punishment.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And when he knows anything of Our verses, he takes them in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Before them is Hell, and what they had earned will not avail them at all nor what they had taken besides Allah as allies. And they will have a great punishment.

Name: Crouching
Verse: This [Qur'an] is guidance. And those who have disbelieved in the verses of their Lord will have a painful punishment of foul nature.

Name: Crouching
Verse: It is Allah who subjected to you the sea so that ships may sail upon it by His command and that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And He has subjected to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth - all from Him. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], to those who have believed that they [should] forgive those who expect not the days of Allah so that He may recompense a people for what they used to earn.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Whoever does a good deed - it is for himself; and whoever does evil - it is against the self. Then to your Lord you will be returned.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And We did certainly give the Children of Israel the Scripture and judgement and prophethood, and We provided them with good things and preferred them over the worlds.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And We gave them clear proofs of the matter [of religion]. And they did not differ except after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Then We put you, [O Muhammad], on an ordained way concerning the matter [of religion]; so follow it and do not follow the inclinations of those who do not know.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Indeed, they will never avail you against Allah at all. And indeed, the wrongdoers are allies of one another; but Allah is the protector of the righteous.

Name: Crouching
Verse: This [Qur'an] is enlightenment for mankind and guidance and mercy for a people who are certain [in faith].

Name: Crouching
Verse: Or do those who commit evils think We will make them like those who have believed and done righteous deeds - [make them] equal in their life and their death? Evil is that which they judge.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And Allah created the heavens and earth in truth and so that every soul may be recompensed for what it has earned, and they will not be wronged.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Have you seen he who has taken as his god his [own] desire, and Allah has sent him astray due to knowledge and has set a seal upon his hearing and his heart and put over his vision a veil? So who will guide him after Allah ? Then will you not be reminded?

Name: Crouching
Verse: And they say, "There is not but our worldly life; we die and live, and nothing destroys us except time." And they have of that no knowledge; they are only assuming.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, their argument is only that they say, "Bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."

Name: Crouching
Verse: Say, " Allah causes you to live, then causes you to die; then He will assemble you for the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt, but most of the people do not know."

Name: Crouching
Verse: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And the Day the Hour appears - that Day the falsifiers will lose.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And you will see every nation kneeling [from fear]. Every nation will be called to its record [and told], "Today you will be recompensed for what you used to do.

Name: Crouching
Verse: This, Our record, speaks about you in truth. Indeed, We were having transcribed whatever you used to do."

Name: Crouching
Verse: So as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. That is what is the clear attainment.

Name: Crouching
Verse: But as for those who disbelieved, [it will be said], "Were not Our verses recited to you, but you were arrogant and became a people of criminals?

Name: Crouching
Verse: And when it was said, 'Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth and the Hour [is coming] - no doubt about it,' you said, 'We know not what is the Hour. We assume only assumption, and we are not convinced.' "

Name: Crouching
Verse: And the evil consequences of what they did will appear to them, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And it will be said, "Today We will forget you as you forgot the meeting of this Day of yours, and your refuge is the Fire, and for you there are no helpers.

Name: Crouching
Verse: That is because you took the verses of Allah in ridicule, and worldly life deluded you." So that Day they will not be removed from it, nor will they be asked to appease [ Allah ].

Name: Crouching
Verse: Then, to Allah belongs [all] praise - Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the worlds.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And to Him belongs [all] grandeur within the heavens and the earth, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Ha, Meem.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: The revelation of the Book is from Allah , the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: We did not create the heavens and earth and what is between them except in truth and [for] a specified term. But those who disbelieve, from that of which they are warned, are turning away.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered that which you invoke besides Allah ? Show me what they have created of the earth; or did they have partnership in [creation of] the heavens? Bring me a scripture [revealed] before this or a [remaining] trace of knowledge, if you should be truthful."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And who is more astray than he who invokes besides Allah those who will not respond to him until the Day of Resurrection, and they, of their invocation, are unaware.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And when the people are gathered [that Day], they [who were invoked] will be enemies to them, and they will be deniers of their worship.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is obvious magic."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Or do they say, "He has invented it?" Say, "If I have invented it, you will not possess for me [the power of protection] from Allah at all. He is most knowing of that in which you are involved. Sufficient is He as Witness between me and you, and He is the Forgiving the Merciful."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Say, "I am not something original among the messengers, nor do I know what will be done with me or with you. I only follow that which is revealed to me, and I am not but a clear warner."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Say, "Have you considered: if the Qur'an was from Allah , and you disbelieved in it while a witness from the Children of Israel has testified to something similar and believed while you were arrogant... ?" Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And those who disbelieve say of those who believe, "If it had [truly] been good, they would not have preceded us to it." And when they are not guided by it, they will say, "This is an ancient falsehood."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And before it was the scripture of Moses to lead and as a mercy. And this is a confirming Book in an Arabic tongue to warn those who have wronged and as good tidings to the doers of good.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Indeed, those who have said, "Our Lord is Allah ," and then remained on a right course - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Those are the companions of Paradise, abiding eternally therein as reward for what they used to do.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And We have enjoined upon man, to his parents, good treatment. His mother carried him with hardship and gave birth to him with hardship, and his gestation and weaning [period] is thirty months. [He grows] until, when he reaches maturity and reaches [the age of] forty years, he says, "My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to work righteousness of which You will approve and make righteous for me my offspring. Indeed, I have repented to You, and indeed, I am of the Muslims."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Those are the ones from whom We will accept the best of what they did and overlook their misdeeds, [their being] among the companions of Paradise. [That is] the promise of truth which they had been promised.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: But one who says to his parents, "Uff to you; do you promise me that I will be brought forth [from the earth] when generations before me have already passed on [into oblivion]?" while they call to Allah for help [and to their son], "Woe to you! Believe! Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth." But he says, "This is not but legends of the former people" -

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Those are the ones upon whom the word has come into effect, [who will be] among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they [all] were losers.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And for all there are degrees [of reward and punishment] for what they have done, and [it is] so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds, and they will not be wronged.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And the Day those who disbelieved are exposed to the Fire [it will be said], "You exhausted your pleasures during your worldly life and enjoyed them, so this Day you will be awarded the punishment of [extreme] humiliation because you were arrogant upon the earth without right and because you were defiantly disobedient."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And mention, [O Muhammad], the brother of 'Aad, when he warned his people in the [region of] al-Ahqaf - and warners had already passed on before him and after him - [saying], "Do not worship except Allah . Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: They said, "Have you come to delude us away from our gods? Then bring us what you promise us, if you should be of the truthful."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: He said, "Knowledge [of its time] is only with Allah , and I convey to you that with which I was sent; but I see you [to be] a people behaving ignorantly."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And when they saw it as a cloud approaching their valleys, they said, "This is a cloud bringing us rain!" Rather, it is that for which you were impatient: a wind, within it a painful punishment,

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Destroying everything by command of its Lord. And they became so that nothing was seen [of them] except their dwellings. Thus do We recompense the criminal people.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And We had certainly established them in such as We have not established you, and We made for them hearing and vision and hearts. But their hearing and vision and hearts availed them not from anything [of the punishment] when they were [continually] rejecting the signs of Allah ; and they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And We have already destroyed what surrounds you of [those] cities, and We have diversified the signs [or verses] that perhaps they might return [from disbelief].

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Then why did those they took besides Allah as deities by which to approach [Him] not aid them? But they had strayed from them. And that was their falsehood and what they were inventing.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We directed to you a few of the jinn, listening to the Qur'an. And when they attended it, they said, "Listen quietly." And when it was concluded, they went back to their people as warners.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: They said, "O our people, indeed we have heard a [recited] Book revealed after Moses confirming what was before it which guides to the truth and to a straight path.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: O our people, respond to the Messenger of Allah and believe in him; Allah will forgive for you your sins and protect you from a painful punishment.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: But he who does not respond to the Caller of Allah will not cause failure [to Him] upon earth, and he will not have besides Him any protectors. Those are in manifest error."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Do they not see that Allah , who created the heavens and earth and did not fail in their creation, is able to give life to the dead? Yes. Indeed, He is over all things competent.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And the Day those who disbelieved are exposed to the Fire [it will be said], "Is this not the truth?" They will say, "Yes, by our Lord." He will say, "Then taste the punishment because you used to disbelieve."

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: So be patient, [O Muhammad], as were those of determination among the messengers and do not be impatient for them. It will be - on the Day they see that which they are promised - as though they had not remained [in the world] except an hour of a day. [This is] notification. And will [any] be destroyed except the defiantly disobedient people?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Those who disbelieve and avert [people] from the way of Allah - He will waste their deeds.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: And those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what has been sent down upon Muhammad - and it is the truth from their Lord - He will remove from them their misdeeds and amend their condition.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: That is because those who disbelieve follow falsehood, and those who believe follow the truth from their Lord. Thus does Allah present to the people their comparisons.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: So when you meet those who disbelieve [in battle], strike [their] necks until, when you have inflicted slaughter upon them, then secure their bonds, and either [confer] favor afterwards or ransom [them] until the war lays down its burdens. That [is the command]. And if Allah had willed, He could have taken vengeance upon them [Himself], but [He ordered armed struggle] to test some of you by means of others. And those who are killed in the cause of Allah - never will He waste their deeds.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: He will guide them and amend their condition

Name: Muhammad
Verse: And admit them to Paradise, which He has made known to them.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: O you who have believed, if you support Allah , He will support you and plant firmly your feet.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: But those who disbelieve - for them is misery, and He will waste their deeds.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: That is because they disliked what Allah revealed, so He rendered worthless their deeds.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Have they not traveled through the land and seen how was the end of those before them? Allah destroyed [everything] over them, and for the disbelievers is something comparable.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: That is because Allah is the protector of those who have believed and because the disbelievers have no protector.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Indeed, Allah will admit those who have believed and done righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow, but those who disbelieve enjoy themselves and eat as grazing livestock eat, and the Fire will be a residence for them.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: And how many a city was stronger than your city [Makkah] which drove you out? We destroyed them; and there was no helper for them.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: So is he who is on clear evidence from his Lord like him to whom the evil of his work has been made attractive and they follow their [own] desires?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers of water unaltered, rivers of milk the taste of which never changes, rivers of wine delicious to those who drink, and rivers of purified honey, in which they will have from all [kinds of] fruits and forgiveness from their Lord, like [that of] those who abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink scalding water that will sever their intestines?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: And among them, [O Muhammad], are those who listen to you, until when they depart from you, they say to those who were given knowledge, "What has he said just now?" Those are the ones of whom Allah has sealed over their hearts and who have followed their [own] desires.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Then do they await except that the Hour should come upon them unexpectedly? But already there have come [some of] its indications. Then what good to them, when it has come, will be their remembrance?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: So know, [O Muhammad], that there is no deity except Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and believing women. And Allah knows of your movement and your resting place.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Those who believe say, "Why has a surah not been sent down? But when a precise surah is revealed and fighting is mentioned therein, you see those in whose hearts is hypocrisy looking at you with a look of one overcome by death. And more appropriate for them [would have been]

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Obedience and good words. And when the matter [of fighting] was determined, if they had been true to Allah , it would have been better for them.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: So would you perhaps, if you turned away, cause corruption on earth and sever your [ties of] relationship?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Those [who do so] are the ones that Allah has cursed, so He deafened them and blinded their vision.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an, or are there locks upon [their] hearts?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Indeed, those who reverted back [to disbelief] after guidance had become clear to them - Satan enticed them and prolonged hope for them.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: That is because they said to those who disliked what Allah sent down, "We will obey you in part of the matter." And Allah knows what they conceal.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Then how [will it be] when the angels take them in death, striking their faces and their backs?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: That is because they followed what angered Allah and disliked [what earns] His pleasure, so He rendered worthless their deeds.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that Allah would never expose their [feelings of] hatred?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: And if We willed, We could show them to you, and you would know them by their mark; but you will surely know them by the tone of [their] speech. And Allah knows your deeds.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah ] and the patient, and We will test your affairs.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and opposed the Messenger after guidance had become clear to them - never will they harm Allah at all, and He will render worthless their deeds.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: O you who have believed, obey Allah and obey the Messenger and do not invalidate your deeds.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and then died while they were disbelievers - never will Allah forgive them.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: So do not weaken and call for peace while you are superior; and Allah is with you and will never deprive you of [the reward of] your deeds.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: If He should ask you for them and press you, you would withhold, and He would expose your unwillingness.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Here you are - those invited to spend in the cause of Allah - but among you are those who withhold [out of greed]. And whoever withholds only withholds [benefit] from himself; and Allah is the Free of need, while you are the needy. And if you turn away, He will replace you with another people; then they will not be the likes of you.

Name: Victory
Verse: Indeed, We have given you, [O Muhammad], a clear conquest

Name: Victory
Verse: That Allah may forgive for you what preceded of your sin and what will follow and complete His favor upon you and guide you to a straight path

Name: Victory
Verse: And [that] Allah may aid you with a mighty victory.

Name: Victory
Verse: It is He who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the believers that they would increase in faith along with their [present] faith. And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth, and ever is Allah Knowing and Wise.

Name: Victory
Verse: And [that] He may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women, and the polytheist men and polytheist women - those who assume about Allah an assumption of evil nature. Upon them is a misfortune of evil nature; and Allah has become angry with them and has cursed them and prepared for them Hell, and evil it is as a destination.

Name: Victory
