Verse: And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.

Name: Victory
Verse: Indeed, We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner

Name: Victory
Verse: That you [people] may believe in Allah and His Messenger and honor him and respect the Prophet and exalt Allah morning and afternoon.

Name: Victory
Verse: Indeed, those who pledge allegiance to you, [O Muhammad] - they are actually pledging allegiance to Allah . The hand of Allah is over their hands. So he who breaks his word only breaks it to the detriment of himself. And he who fulfills that which he has promised Allah - He will give him a great reward.

Name: Victory
Verse: Those who remained behind of the bedouins will say to you, "Our properties and our families occupied us, so ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not within their hearts. Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He intended for you harm or intended for you benefit? Rather, ever is Allah , with what you do, Acquainted.

Name: Victory
Verse: But you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, ever, and that was made pleasing in your hearts. And you assumed an assumption of evil and became a people ruined."

Name: Victory
Verse: And whoever has not believed in Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers a Blaze.

Name: Victory
Verse: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: Victory
Verse: Those who remained behind will say when you set out toward the war booty to take it, "Let us follow you." They wish to change the words of Allah . Say, "Never will you follow us. Thus did Allah say before." So they will say, "Rather, you envy us." But [in fact] they were not understanding except a little.

Name: Victory
Verse: Say to those who remained behind of the bedouins, "You will be called to [face] a people of great military might; you may fight them, or they will submit. So if you obey, Allah will give you a good reward; but if you turn away as you turned away before, He will punish you with a painful punishment."

Name: Victory
Verse: There is not upon the blind any guilt or upon the lame any guilt or upon the ill any guilt [for remaining behind]. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger - He will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow; but whoever turns away - He will punish him with a painful punishment.

Name: Victory
Verse: Certainly was Allah pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you, [O Muhammad], under the tree, and He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down tranquillity upon them and rewarded them with an imminent conquest

Name: Victory
Verse: And much war booty which they will take. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.

Name: Victory
Verse: Allah has promised you much booty that you will take [in the future] and has hastened for you this [victory] and withheld the hands of people from you - that it may be a sign for the believers and [that] He may guide you to a straight path.

Name: Victory
Verse: And [He promises] other [victories] that you were [so far] unable to [realize] which Allah has already encompassed. And ever is Allah , over all things, competent.

Name: Victory
Verse: And if those [Makkans] who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs [in flight]. Then they would not find a protector or a helper.

Name: Victory
Verse: And it is He who withheld their hands from you and your hands from them within [the area of] Makkah after He caused you to overcome them. And ever is Allah of what you do, Seeing.

Name: Victory
Verse: They are the ones who disbelieved and obstructed you from al-Masjid al-haram while the offering was prevented from reaching its place of sacrifice. And if not for believing men and believing women whom you did not know - that you might trample them and there would befall you because of them dishonor without [your] knowledge - [you would have been permitted to enter Makkah]. [This was so] that Allah might admit to His mercy whom He willed. If they had been apart [from them], We would have punished those who disbelieved among them with painful punishment

Name: Victory
Verse: When those who disbelieved had put into their hearts chauvinism - the chauvinism of the time of ignorance. But Allah sent down His tranquillity upon His Messenger and upon the believers and imposed upon them the word of righteousness, and they were more deserving of it and worthy of it. And ever is Allah , of all things, Knowing.

Name: Victory
Verse: Certainly has Allah showed to His Messenger the vision in truth. You will surely enter al-Masjid al-haram, if Allah wills, in safety, with your heads shaved and [hair] shortened, not fearing [anyone]. He knew what you did not know and has arranged before that a conquest near [at hand].

Name: Victory
Verse: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion. And sufficient is Allah as Witness.

Name: Victory
Verse: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah ; and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves. You see them bowing and prostrating [in prayer], seeking bounty from Allah and [His] pleasure. Their mark is on their faces from the trace of prostration. That is their description in the Torah. And their description in the Gospel is as a plant which produces its offshoots and strengthens them so they grow firm and stand upon their stalks, delighting the sowers - so that Allah may enrage by them the disbelievers. Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds among them forgiveness and a great reward.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O you who have believed, do not put [yourselves] before Allah and His Messenger but fear Allah . Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O you who have believed, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet or be loud to him in speech like the loudness of some of you to others, lest your deeds become worthless while you perceive not.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Indeed, those who lower their voices before the Messenger of Allah - they are the ones whose hearts Allah has tested for righteousness. For them is forgiveness and great reward.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Indeed, those who call you, [O Muhammad], from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: And if they had been patient until you [could] come out to them, it would have been better for them. But Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O you who have believed, if there comes to you a disobedient one with information, investigate, lest you harm a people out of ignorance and become, over what you have done, regretful.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: And know that among you is the Messenger of Allah . If he were to obey you in much of the matter, you would be in difficulty, but Allah has endeared to you the faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief, defiance and disobedience. Those are the [rightly] guided.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: And if two factions among the believers should fight, then make settlement between the two. But if one of them oppresses the other, then fight against the one that oppresses until it returns to the ordinance of Allah . And if it returns, then make settlement between them in justice and act justly. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers. And fear Allah that you may receive mercy.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O you who have believed, let not a people ridicule [another] people; perhaps they may be better than them; nor let women ridicule [other] women; perhaps they may be better than them. And do not insult one another and do not call each other by [offensive] nicknames. Wretched is the name of disobedience after [one's] faith. And whoever does not repent - then it is those who are the wrongdoers.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O you who have believed, avoid much [negative] assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear Allah ; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not [yet] believed; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of Allah . It is those who are the truthful.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Say, "Would you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah is Knowing of all things?"

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islam. Say, "Do not consider your Islam a favor to me. Rather, Allah has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful."

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Indeed, Allah knows the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an...

Name: Qâf
Verse: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.

Name: Qâf
Verse: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."

Name: Qâf
Verse: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.

Name: Qâf
Verse: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?

Name: Qâf
Verse: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,

Name: Qâf
Verse: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah ].

Name: Qâf
Verse: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

Name: Qâf
Verse: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -

Name: Qâf
Verse: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.

Name: Qâf
Verse: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud

Name: Qâf
Verse: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot

Name: Qâf
Verse: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein

Name: Qâf
Verse: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].

Name: Qâf
Verse: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."

Name: Qâf
Verse: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,

Name: Qâf
Verse: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."

Name: Qâf
Verse: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."

Name: Qâf
Verse: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."

Name: Qâf
Verse: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"

Name: Qâf
Verse: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,

Name: Qâf
Verse: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].

Name: Qâf
Verse: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."

Name: Qâf
Verse: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?

Name: Qâf
Verse: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].

Name: Qâf
Verse: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.

Name: Qâf
Verse: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [ Allah ] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,

Name: Qâf
Verse: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -

Name: Qâf
Verse: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].

Name: Qâf
Verse: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

Name: Qâf
Verse: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.

Name: Qâf
Verse: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And those [ships] sailing with ease

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: By the heaven containing pathways,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Indeed, you are in differing speech.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Destroyed are the falsifiers

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: They used to sleep but little of the night,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: To send down upon them stones of clay,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: So flee to Allah . Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.

Name: The Mount
Verse: By the mount

Name: The Mount
Verse: And [by] a Book inscribed

Name: The Mount
Verse: In parchment spread open

Name: The Mount
Verse: And [by] the frequented House

Name: The Mount
Verse: And [by] the heaven raised high

Name: The Mount
Verse: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],

Name: The Mount
Verse: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Of it there is no preventer.

Name: The Mount
Verse: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

Name: The Mount
Verse: And the mountains will pass on, departing -

Name: The Mount
Verse: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,

Name: The Mount
Verse: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.

Name: The Mount
Verse: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],

Name: The Mount
Verse: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Then is this magic, or do you not see?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,

Name: The Mount
Verse: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

Name: The Mount
Verse: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.

Name: The Mount
Verse: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.

Name: The Mount
Verse: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

Name: The Mount
Verse: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah ].

Name: The Mount
Verse: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."

Name: The Mount
Verse: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"

Name: The Mount
Verse: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or has He daughters while you have sons?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or have they a deity other than Allah ? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."

Name: The Mount
Verse: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -

Name: The Mount
Verse: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [ Allah ] with praise of your Lord when you arise.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.

Name: The Star
Verse: By the star when it descends,

Name: The Star
Verse: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred,

Name: The Star
Verse: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.

Name: The Star
Verse: It is not but a revelation revealed,

Name: The Star
Verse: Taught to him by one intense in strength -

Name: The Star
Verse: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form

Name: The Star
Verse: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.

Name: The Star
Verse: Then he approached and descended

Name: The Star
Verse: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.

Name: The Star
Verse: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed.

Name: The Star
Verse: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.

Name: The Star
Verse: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?

Name: The Star
Verse: And he certainly saw him in another descent

Name: The Star
Verse: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -

Name: The Star
Verse: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -

Name: The Star
Verse: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].

Name: The Star
Verse: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit].

Name: The Star
Verse: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.

Name: The Star
Verse: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza?

Name: The Star
Verse: And Manat, the third - the other one?

Name: The Star
Verse: Is the male for you and for Him the female?

Name: The Star
Verse: That, then, is an unjust division.

Name: The Star
Verse: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.

Name: The Star
Verse: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?

Name: The Star
Verse: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

Name: The Star
Verse: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.

Name: The Star
Verse: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,

Name: The Star
Verse: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.

Name: The Star
Verse: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.

Name: The Star
Verse: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided.

Name: The Star
Verse: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -

Name: The Star
Verse: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.

Name: The Star
Verse: Have you seen the one who turned away

Name: The Star
Verse: And gave a little and [then] refrained?

Name: The Star
Verse: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?

Name: The Star
Verse: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses

Name: The Star
Verse: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -

Name: The Star
Verse: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

Name: The Star
Verse: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives

Name: The Star
Verse: And that his effort is going to be seen -

Name: The Star
Verse: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

Name: The Star
Verse: And that to your Lord is the finality

Name: The Star
Verse: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

Name: The Star
Verse: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

Name: The Star
Verse: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -

Name: The Star
Verse: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

Name: The Star
Verse: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

Name: The Star
Verse: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

Name: The Star
Verse: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

Name: The Star
Verse: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

Name: The Star
Verse: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -

Name: The Star
Verse: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.

Name: The Star
Verse: And the overturned towns He hurled down

Name: The Star
Verse: And covered them by that which He covered.

Name: The Star
Verse: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

Name: The Star
Verse: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.

Name: The Star
Verse: The Approaching Day has approached.

Name: The Star
Verse: Of it, [from those] besides Allah , there is no remover.

Name: The Star
Verse: Then at this statement do you wonder?

Name: The Star
Verse: And you laugh and do not weep

Name: The Star
Verse: While you are proudly sporting?

Name: The Star
Verse: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].

Name: The Moon
Verse: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].

Name: The Moon
Verse: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."

Name: The Moon
Verse: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -

Name: The Moon
Verse: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].

Name: The Moon
Verse: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,

Name: The Moon
Verse: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,

Name: The Moon
Verse: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."

Name: The Moon
Verse: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.

Name: The Moon
Verse: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."

Name: The Moon
Verse: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

Name: The Moon
Verse: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,

Name: The Moon
Verse: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,

Name: The Moon
Verse: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: Thamud denied the warning

Name: The Moon
Verse: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."

Name: The Moon
Verse: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].

Name: The Moon
Verse: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].

Name: The Moon
Verse: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: The people of Lot denied the warning.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn

Name: The Moon
Verse: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."

Name: The Moon
Verse: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.

Name: The Moon
Verse: So taste My punishment and warning.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.

Name: The Moon
Verse: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?

Name: The Moon
Verse: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?

Name: The Moon
Verse: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.

Name: The Moon
Verse: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: And everything they did is in written records.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,

Name: The Moon
Verse: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: The Most Merciful

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Taught the Qur'an,

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Created man,

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And the stars and trees prostrate.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: That you not transgress within the balance.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And grain having husks and scented plants.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Everyone upon the earth will perish,

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah ].

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Having [spreading] branches.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In both of them are two springs, flowing.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: As if they were rubies and coral.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Dark green [in color].

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In both of them are two springs, spouting.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In them are good and beautiful women -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Fair ones reserved in pavilions -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Untouched before them by man or jinni -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

Name: The Event
Verse: When the Occurrence occurs,

Name: The Event
Verse: There is, at its occurrence, no denial.

Name: The Event
Verse: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].

Name: The Event
Verse: When the earth is shaken with convulsion

Name: The Event
Verse: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling

Name: The Event
Verse: And become dust dispersing.

Name: The Event
Verse: And you become [of] three kinds:

Name: The Event
Verse: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?

Name: The Event
Verse: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

Name: The Event
Verse: And the forerunners, the forerunners -

Name: The Event
Verse: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah ]

Name: The Event
Verse: In the Gardens of Pleasure,

Name: The Event
Verse: A [large] company of the former peoples

Name: The Event
Verse: And a few of the later peoples,

Name: The Event
Verse: On thrones woven [with ornament],

Name: The Event
Verse: Reclining on them, facing each other.

Name: The Event
Verse: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal

Name: The Event
Verse: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring -

Name: The Event
Verse: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated -

Name: The Event
Verse: And fruit of what they select

Name: The Event
Verse: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire.

Name: The Event
Verse: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes,

Name: The Event
Verse: The likenesses of pearls well-protected,

Name: The Event
Verse: As reward for what they used to do.

Name: The Event
Verse: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin -

Name: The Event
Verse: Only a saying: "Peace, peace."

Name: The Event
Verse: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?

Name: The Event
Verse: And [banana] trees layered [with fruit]

Name: The Event
Verse: And shade extended

Name: The Event
Verse: And water poured out

Name: The Event
Verse: And fruit, abundant [and varied],

Name: The Event
Verse: Neither limited [to season] nor forbidden,

Name: The Event
Verse: And [upon] beds raised high.

Name: The Event
Verse: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation

Name: The Event
Verse: And made them virgins,

Name: The Event
Verse: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age,

Name: The Event
Verse: For the companions of the right [who are]

Name: The Event
Verse: A company of the former peoples

Name: The Event
Verse: And a company of the later peoples.

Name: The Event
Verse: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

Name: The Event
Verse: And a shade of black smoke,

Name: The Event
Verse: Neither cool nor beneficial.

Name: The Event
Verse: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence,

Name: The Event
Verse: And they used to persist in the great violation,

Name: The Event
Verse: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

Name: The Event
Verse: And our forefathers [as well]?"

Name: The Event
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples

Name: The Event
Verse: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day."

Name: The Event
Verse: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,

Name: The Event
Verse: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum

Name: The Event
Verse: And filling with it your bellies

Name: The Event
Verse: And drinking on top of it from scalding water

Name: The Event
Verse: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.

Name: The Event
Verse: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.

Name: The Event
Verse: We have created you, so why do you not believe?

Name: The Event
Verse: Have you seen that which you emit?

Name: The Event
Verse: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?

Name: The Event
Verse: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone

Name: The Event
Verse: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.

Name: The Event
Verse: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?

Name: The Event
Verse: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?

Name: The Event
Verse: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?

Name: The Event
Verse: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,

Name: The Event
Verse: Rather, we have been deprived."

Name: The Event
Verse: And have you seen the water that you drink?

Name: The Event
Verse: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?

Name: The Event
Verse: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?

Name: The Event
Verse: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?

Name: The Event
Verse: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?

Name: The Event
Verse: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,

Name: The Event
Verse: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

Name: The Event
Verse: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,

Name: The Event
Verse: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.

Name: The Event
Verse: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an

Name: The Event
Verse: In a Register well-protected;

Name: The Event
Verse: None touch it except the purified.

Name: The Event
Verse: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent

Name: The Event
Verse: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?

Name: The Event
Verse: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat

Name: The Event
Verse: And you are at that time looking on -

Name: The Event
Verse: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -

Name: The Event
Verse: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,

Name: The Event
Verse: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?

Name: The Event
Verse: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah ,

Name: The Event
Verse: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.

Name: The Event
Verse: And if he was of the companions of the right,

Name: The Event
Verse: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."

Name: The Event
Verse: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,

Name: The Event
Verse: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water

Name: The Event
Verse: And burning in Hellfire

Name: The Event
Verse: Indeed, this is the true certainty,

Name: The Event
Verse: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

Name: Iron
Verse: Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts Allah , and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: Iron
Verse: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent.

Name: Iron
Verse: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.

Name: Iron
Verse: It is He who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein; and He is with you wherever you are. And Allah , of what you do, is Seeing.

Name: Iron
Verse: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.

Name: Iron
Verse: He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and he is Knowing of that within the breasts.

Name: Iron
Verse: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend out of that in which He has made you successors. For those who have believed among you and spent, there will be a great reward.

Name: Iron
Verse: And why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord and He has taken your covenant, if you should [truly] be believers?

Name: Iron
Verse: It is He who sends down upon His Servant [Muhammad] verses of clear evidence that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And indeed, Allah is to you Kind and Merciful.

Name: Iron
Verse: And why do you not spend in the cause of Allah while to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth? Not equal among you are those who spent before the conquest [of Makkah] and fought [and those who did so after it]. Those are greater in degree than they who spent afterwards and fought. But to all Allah has promised the best [reward]. And Allah , with what you do, is Acquainted.

Name: Iron
Verse: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He will multiply it for him and he will have a noble reward?

Name: Iron
Verse: On the Day you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment.

Name: Iron
Verse: On the [same] Day the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believed, "Wait for us that we may acquire some of your light." It will be said, "Go back behind you and seek light." And a wall will be placed between them with a door, its interior containing mercy, but on the outside of it is torment.

Name: Iron
Verse: The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you afflicted yourselves and awaited [misfortune for us] and doubted, and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah . And the Deceiver deceived you concerning Allah .

Name: Iron
Verse: So today no ransom will be taken from you or from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire. It is most worthy of you, and wretched is the destination.

Name: Iron
Verse: Has the time not come for those who have believed that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and a long period passed over them, so their hearts hardened; and many of them are defiantly disobedient.

Name: Iron
Verse: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand.

Name: Iron
Verse: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity and [they who] have loaned Allah a goodly loan - it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a noble reward.

Name: Iron
Verse: And those who have believed in Allah and His messengers - those are [in the ranks of] the supporters of truth and the martyrs, with their Lord. For them is their reward and their light. But those who have disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of Hellfire.

Name: Iron
Verse: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another and competition in increase of wealth and children - like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion.

Name: Iron
Verse: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whose width is like the width of the heavens and earth, prepared for those who believed in Allah and His messengers. That is the bounty of Allah which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.

Name: Iron
Verse: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being - indeed that, for Allah , is easy -

Name: Iron
Verse: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult [in pride] over what He has given you. And Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful -

Name: Iron
Verse: We have already sent Our messengers with clear evidences and sent down with them the Scripture and the balance that the people may maintain [their affairs] in justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great military might and benefits for the people, and so that Allah may make evident those who support Him and His messengers unseen. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.

Name: Iron
Verse: And We have already sent Noah and Abraham and placed in their descendants prophethood and scripture; and among them is he who is guided, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.

Name: Iron
Verse: Then We sent following their footsteps Our messengers and followed [them] with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him compassion and mercy and monasticism, which they innovated; We did not prescribe it for them except [that they did so] seeking the approval of Allah . But they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave the ones who believed among them their reward, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.

Name: Iron
Verse: O you who have believed, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger; He will [then] give you a double portion of His mercy and make for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Certainly has Allah heard the speech of the one who argues with you, [O Muhammad], concerning her husband and directs her complaint to Allah . And Allah hears your dialogue; indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Those who pronounce thihar among you [to separate] from their wives - they are not [consequently] their mothers. Their mothers are none but those who gave birth to them. And indeed, they are saying an objectionable statement and a falsehood. But indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: And those who pronounce thihar from their wives and then [wish to] go back on what they said - then [there must be] the freeing of a slave before they touch one another. That is what you are admonished thereby; and Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: And he who does not find [a slave] - then a fast for two months consecutively before they touch one another; and he who is unable - then the feeding of sixty poor persons. That is for you to believe [completely] in Allah and His Messenger; and those are the limits [set by] Allah . And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Indeed, those who oppose Allah and His Messenger are abased as those before them were abased. And We have certainly sent down verses of clear evidence. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all and inform them of what they did. Allah had enumerated it, while they forgot it; and Allah is, over all things, Witness.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is in no private conversation three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them [in knowledge] wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that [word] by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the destination.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: O you who have believed, when you converse privately, do not converse about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger but converse about righteousness and piety. And fear Allah , to whom you will be gathered.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Private conversation is only from Satan that he may grieve those who have believed, but he will not harm them at all except by permission of Allah . And upon Allah let the believers rely.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: O you who have believed, when you are told, "Space yourselves" in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you. And when you are told, "Arise," then arise; Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: O you who have believed, when you [wish to] privately consult the Messenger, present before your consultation a charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you find not [the means] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Have you feared to present before your consultation charities? Then when you do not and Allah has forgiven you, then [at least] establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Have you not considered those who make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to untruth while they know [they are lying].

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: They took their [false] oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah , and for them is a humiliating punishment.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: On the Day Allah will resurrect them all, and they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they are [standing] on something. Unquestionably, it is they who are the liars.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of Allah . Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan - they will be the losers.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Indeed, the ones who oppose Allah and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: You will not find a people who believe in Allah and the Last Day having affection for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred. Those - He has decreed within their hearts faith and supported them with spirit from Him. And We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah . Unquestionably, the party of Allah - they are the successful.

Name: Exile
Verse: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah , and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: Exile
Verse: It is He who expelled the ones who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture from their homes at the first gathering. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah ; but [the decree of] Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take warning, O people of vision.

Name: Exile
Verse: And if not that Allah had decreed for them evacuation, He would have punished them in [this] world, and for them in the Hereafter is the punishment of the Fire.

Name: Exile
Verse: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.

Name: Exile
Verse: Whatever you have cut down of [their] palm trees or left standing on their trunks - it was by permission of Allah and so He would disgrace the defiantly disobedient.

Name: Exile
Verse: And what Allah restored [of property] to His Messenger from them - you did not spur for it [in an expedition] any horses or camels, but Allah gives His messengers power over whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent.

Name: Exile
Verse: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives and orphans and the [stranded] traveler - so that it will not be a perpetual distribution among the rich from among you. And whatever the Messenger has given you - take; and what he has forbidden you - refrain from. And fear Allah ; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.

Name: Exile
Verse: For the poor emigrants who were expelled from their homes and their properties, seeking bounty from Allah and [His] approval and supporting Allah and His Messenger, [there is also a share]. Those are the truthful.

Name: Exile
Verse: And [also for] those who were settled in al-Madinah and [adopted] the faith before them. They love those who emigrated to them and find not any want in their breasts of what the emigrants were given but give [them] preference over themselves, even though they are in privation. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.

Name: Exile
Verse: And [there is a share for] those who came after them, saying, "Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and put not in our hearts [any] resentment toward those who have believed. Our Lord, indeed You are Kind and Merciful."

Name: Exile
Verse: Have you not considered those who practice hypocrisy, saying to their brothers who have disbelieved among the People of the Scripture, "If you are expelled, we will surely leave with you, and we will not obey, in regard to you, anyone - ever; and if you are fought, we will surely aid you." But Allah testifies that they are liars.

Name: Exile
Verse: If they are expelled, they will not leave with them, and if they are fought, they will not aid them. And [even] if they should aid them, they will surely turn their backs; then [thereafter] they will not be aided.

Name: Exile
Verse: You [believers] are more fearful within their breasts than Allah . That is because they are a people who do not understand.

Name: Exile
Verse: They will not fight you all except within fortified cities or from behind walls. Their violence among themselves is severe. You think they are together, but their hearts are diverse. That is because they are a people who do not reason.

Name: Exile
Verse: So the outcome for both of them is that they will be in the Fire, abiding eternally therein. And that is the recompense of the wrong-doers.

Name: Exile
Verse: O you who have believed, fear Allah . And let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow - and fear Allah . Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

Name: Exile
Verse: And be not like those who forgot Allah , so He made them forget themselves. Those are the defiantly disobedient.

Name: Exile
Verse: Not equal are the companions of the Fire and the companions of Paradise. The companions of Paradise - they are the attainers [of success].

Name: Exile
Verse: If We had sent down this Qur'an upon a mountain, you would have seen it humbled and coming apart from fear of Allah . And these examples We present to the people that perhaps they will give thought.

Name: Exile
Verse: He is Allah , other than whom there is no deity, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed. He is the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

Name: Exile
Verse: He is Allah , other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior. Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

Name: Exile
Verse: He is Allah , the Creator, the Inventor, the Fashioner; to Him belong the best names. Whatever is in the heavens and earth is exalting Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O you who have believed, do not take My enemies and your enemies as allies, extending to them affection while they have disbelieved in what came to you of the truth, having driven out the Prophet and yourselves [only] because you believe in Allah , your Lord. If you have come out for jihad in My cause and seeking means to My approval, [take them not as friends]. You confide to them affection, but I am most knowing of what you have concealed and what you have declared. And whoever does it among you has certainly strayed from the soundness of the way.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: If they gain dominance over you, they would be to you as enemies and extend against you their hands and their tongues with evil, and they wish you would disbelieve.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Never will your relatives or your children benefit you; the Day of Resurrection He will judge between you. And Allah , of what you do, is Seeing.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: There has already been for you an excellent pattern in Abraham and those with him, when they said to their people, "Indeed, we are disassociated from you and from whatever you worship other than Allah . We have denied you, and there has appeared between us and you animosity and hatred forever until you believe in Allah alone" except for the saying of Abraham to his father, "I will surely ask forgiveness for you, but I have not [power to do] for you anything against Allah . Our Lord, upon You we have relied, and to You we have returned, and to You is the destination.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Our Lord, make us not [objects of] torment for the disbelievers and forgive us, our Lord. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise."

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: There has certainly been for you in them an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Perhaps Allah will put, between you and those to whom you have been enemies among them, affection. And Allah is competent, and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Allah does not forbid you from those who do not fight you because of religion and do not expel you from your homes - from being righteous toward them and acting justly toward them. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Allah only forbids you from those who fight you because of religion and expel you from your homes and aid in your expulsion - [forbids] that you make allies of them. And whoever makes allies of them, then it is those who are the wrongdoers.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O you who have believed, when the believing women come to you as emigrants, examine them. Allah is most knowing as to their faith. And if you know them to be believers, then do not return them to the disbelievers; they are not lawful [wives] for them, nor are they lawful [husbands] for them. But give the disbelievers what they have spent. And there is no blame upon you if you marry them when you have given them their due compensation. And hold not to marriage bonds with disbelieving women, but ask for what you have spent and let them ask for what they have spent. That is the judgement of Allah ; He judges between you. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: And if you have lost any of your wives to the disbelievers and you subsequently obtain [something], then give those whose wives have gone the equivalent of what they had spent. And fear Allah , in whom you are believers.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O Prophet, when the believing women come to you pledging to you that they will not associate anything with Allah , nor will they steal, nor will they commit unlawful sexual intercourse, nor will they kill their children, nor will they bring forth a slander they have invented between their arms and legs, nor will they disobey you in what is right - then accept their pledge and ask forgiveness for them of Allah . Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O you who have believed, do not make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry. They have despaired of [reward in] the Hereafter just as the disbelievers have despaired of [meeting] the inhabitants of the graves.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah , and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: O you who have believed, why do you say what you do not do?

Name: The Ranks
Verse: Great is hatred in the sight of Allah that you say what you do not do.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in a row as though they are a [single] structure joined firmly.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Moses said to his people, "O my people, why do you harm me while you certainly know that I am the messenger of Allah to you?" And when they deviated, Allah caused their hearts to deviate. And Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And [mention] when Jesus, the son of Mary, said, "O children of Israel, indeed I am the messenger of Allah to you confirming what came before me of the Torah and bringing good tidings of a messenger to come after me, whose name is Ahmad." But when he came to them with clear evidences, they said, "This is obvious magic."

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah untruth while he is being invited to Islam. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah will perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although those who associate others with Allah dislike it.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment?

Name: The Ranks
Verse: He will forgive for you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence. That is the great attainment.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And [you will obtain] another [favor] that you love - victory from Allah and an imminent conquest; and give good tidings to the believers.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: O you who have believed, be supporters of Allah , as when Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, "Who are my supporters for Allah ?" The disciples said, "We are supporters of Allah ." And a faction of the Children of Israel believed and a faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah , the Sovereign, the Pure, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: It is He who has sent among the unlettered a Messenger from themselves reciting to them His verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and wisdom - although they were before in clear error -

Name: The Congregation
Verse: And [to] others of them who have not yet joined them. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: That is the bounty of Allah , which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: The example of those who were entrusted with the Torah and then did not take it on is like that of a donkey who carries volumes [of books]. Wretched is the example of the people who deny the signs of Allah . And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: Say, "O you who are Jews, if you claim that you are allies of Allah , excluding the [other] people, then wish for death, if you should be truthful."

Name: The Congregation
Verse: But they will not wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: Say, "Indeed, the death from which you flee - indeed, it will meet you. Then you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you about what you used to do."

Name: The Congregation
Verse: O you who have believed, when [the adhan] is called for the prayer on the day of Jumu'ah [Friday], then proceed to the remembrance of Allah and leave trade. That is better for you, if you only knew.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: And when the prayer has been concluded, disperse within the land and seek from the bounty of Allah , and remember Allah often that you may succeed.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: But when they saw a transaction or a diversion, [O Muhammad], they rushed to it and left you standing. Say, "What is with Allah is better than diversion and than a transaction, and Allah is the best of providers."

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: When the hypocrites come to you, [O Muhammad], they say, "We testify that you are the Messenger of Allah ." And Allah knows that you are His Messenger, and Allah testifies that the hypocrites are liars.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: They have taken their oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah . Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: That is because they believed, and then they disbelieved; so their hearts were sealed over, and they do not understand.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: And when you see them, their forms please you, and if they speak, you listen to their speech. [They are] as if they were pieces of wood propped up - they think that every shout is against them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May Allah destroy them; how are they deluded?

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: And when it is said to them, "Come, the Messenger of Allah will ask forgiveness for you," they turn their heads aside and you see them evading while they are arrogant.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: It is all the same for them whether you ask forgiveness for them or do not ask forgiveness for them; never will Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: They are the ones who say, "Do not spend on those who are with the Messenger of Allah until they disband." And to Allah belongs the depositories of the heavens and the earth, but the hypocrites do not understand.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: They say, "If we return to al-Madinah, the more honored [for power] will surely expel therefrom the more humble." And to Allah belongs [all] honor, and to His Messenger, and to the believers, but the hypocrites do not know.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: O you who have believed, let not your wealth and your children divert you from remembrance of Allah . And whoever does that - then those are the losers.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: And spend [in the way of Allah ] from what We have provided you before death approaches one of you and he says, "My Lord, if only You would delay me for a brief term so I would give charity and be among the righteous."

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: But never will Allah delay a soul when its time has come. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah . To Him belongs dominion, and to Him belongs [all] praise, and He is over all things competent.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: It is He who created you, and among you is the disbeliever, and among you is the believer. And Allah , of what you do, is Seeing.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: He created the heavens and earth in truth and formed you and perfected your forms; and to Him is the [final] destination.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Has there not come to you the news of those who disbelieved before? So they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: That is because their messengers used to come to them with clear evidences, but they said, "Shall human beings guide us?" and disbelieved and turned away. And Allah dispensed [with them]; and Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Those who disbelieve have claimed that they will never be resurrected. Say, "Yes, by my Lord, you will surely be resurrected; then you will surely be informed of what you did. And that, for Allah , is easy."

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: So believe in Allah and His Messenger and the Qur'an which We have sent down. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: The Day He will assemble you for the Day of Assembly - that is the Day of Deprivation. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove from him his misdeeds and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: But the ones who disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of the Fire, abiding eternally therein; and wretched is the destination.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah . And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. And Allah is Knowing of all things.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
