Verse: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon Our Messenger is only [the duty of] clear notification.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Allah - there is no deity except Him. And upon Allah let the believers rely.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: O you who have believed, indeed, among your wives and your children are enemies to you, so beware of them. But if you pardon and overlook and forgive - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: So fear Allah as much as you are able and listen and obey and spend [in the way of Allah ]; it is better for your selves. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: If you loan Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Name: Divorce
Verse: O Prophet, when you [Muslims] divorce women, divorce them for [the commencement of] their waiting period and keep count of the waiting period, and fear Allah , your Lord. Do not turn them out of their [husbands'] houses, nor should they [themselves] leave [during that period] unless they are committing a clear immorality. And those are the limits [set by] Allah . And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah has certainly wronged himself. You know not; perhaps Allah will bring about after that a [different] matter.

Name: Divorce
Verse: And when they have [nearly] fulfilled their term, either retain them according to acceptable terms or part with them according to acceptable terms. And bring to witness two just men from among you and establish the testimony for [the acceptance of] Allah . That is instructed to whoever should believe in Allah and the Last day. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out

Name: Divorce
Verse: And will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent.

Name: Divorce
Verse: And those who no longer expect menstruation among your women - if you doubt, then their period is three months, and [also for] those who have not menstruated. And for those who are pregnant, their term is until they give birth. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him of his matter ease.

Name: Divorce
Verse: That is the command of Allah , which He has sent down to you; and whoever fears Allah - He will remove for him his misdeeds and make great for him his reward.

Name: Divorce
Verse: Lodge them [in a section] of where you dwell out of your means and do not harm them in order to oppress them. And if they should be pregnant, then spend on them until they give birth. And if they breastfeed for you, then give them their payment and confer among yourselves in the acceptable way; but if you are in discord, then there may breastfeed for the father another woman.

Name: Divorce
Verse: Let a man of wealth spend from his wealth, and he whose provision is restricted - let him spend from what Allah has given him. Allah does not charge a soul except [according to] what He has given it. Allah will bring about, after hardship, ease.

Name: Divorce
Verse: And how many a city was insolent toward the command of its Lord and His messengers, so We took it to severe account and punished it with a terrible punishment.

Name: Divorce
Verse: And it tasted the bad consequence of its affair, and the outcome of its affair was loss.

Name: Divorce
Verse: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment; so fear Allah , O you of understanding who have believed. Allah has sent down to you the Qur'an.

Name: Divorce
Verse: It is Allah who has created seven heavens and of the earth, the like of them. [His] command descends among them so you may know that Allah is over all things competent and that Allah has encompassed all things in knowledge.

Name: Banning
Verse: O Prophet, why do you prohibit [yourself from] what Allah has made lawful for you, seeking the approval of your wives? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: Banning
Verse: Allah has already ordained for you [Muslims] the dissolution of your oaths. And Allah is your protector, and He is the Knowing, the Wise.

Name: Banning
Verse: And [remember] when the Prophet confided to one of his wives a statement; and when she informed [another] of it and Allah showed it to him, he made known part of it and ignored a part. And when he informed her about it, she said, "Who told you this?" He said, "I was informed by the Knowing, the Acquainted."

Name: Banning
Verse: If you two [wives] repent to Allah , [it is best], for your hearts have deviated. But if you cooperate against him - then indeed Allah is his protector, and Gabriel and the righteous of the believers and the angels, moreover, are [his] assistants.

Name: Banning
Verse: Perhaps his Lord, if he divorced you [all], would substitute for him wives better than you - submitting [to Allah ], believing, devoutly obedient, repentant, worshipping, and traveling - [ones] previously married and virgins.

Name: Banning
Verse: O you who have believed, protect yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, over which are [appointed] angels, harsh and severe; they do not disobey Allah in what He commands them but do what they are commanded.

Name: Banning
Verse: O you who have disbelieved, make no excuses that Day. You will only be recompensed for what you used to do.

Name: Banning
Verse: O you who have believed, repent to Allah with sincere repentance. Perhaps your Lord will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you into gardens beneath which rivers flow [on] the Day when Allah will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will proceed before them and on their right; they will say, "Our Lord, perfect for us our light and forgive us. Indeed, You are over all things competent."

Name: Banning
Verse: O Prophet, strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination.

Name: Banning
Verse: Allah presents an example of those who disbelieved: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were under two of Our righteous servants but betrayed them, so those prophets did not avail them from Allah at all, and it was said, "Enter the Fire with those who enter."

Name: Banning
Verse: And Allah presents an example of those who believed: the wife of Pharaoh, when she said, "My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh and his deeds and save me from the wrongdoing people."

Name: Banning
Verse: And [the example of] Mary, the daughter of 'Imran, who guarded her chastity, so We blew into [her garment] through Our angel, and she believed in the words of her Lord and His scriptures and was of the devoutly obedient.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent -

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner?"

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, ' Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error.' "

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze."

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted?

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful."

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say, " It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah , and I am only a clear warner."

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, "This is that for which you used to call."

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment?"

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say, "He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error."

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?"

Name: The Pen
Verse: Nun. By the pen and what they inscribe,

Name: The Pen
Verse: You are not, [O Muhammad], by the favor of your Lord, a madman.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And indeed, for you is a reward uninterrupted.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And indeed, you are of a great moral character.

Name: The Pen
Verse: So you will see and they will see

Name: The Pen
Verse: Which of you is the afflicted [by a devil].

Name: The Pen
Verse: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Then do not obey the deniers.

Name: The Pen
Verse: They wish that you would soften [in your position], so they would soften [toward you].

Name: The Pen
Verse: And do not obey every worthless habitual swearer

Name: The Pen
Verse: A preventer of good, transgressing and sinful,

Name: The Pen
Verse: Cruel, moreover, and an illegitimate pretender.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Because he is a possessor of wealth and children,

Name: The Pen
Verse: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

Name: The Pen
Verse: We will brand him upon the snout.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Indeed, We have tried them as We tried the companions of the garden, when they swore to cut its fruit in the [early] morning

Name: The Pen
Verse: Without making exception.

Name: The Pen
Verse: So there came upon the garden an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And it became as though reaped.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And they called one another at morning,

Name: The Pen
Verse: So they set out, while lowering their voices,

Name: The Pen
Verse: And they went early in determination, [assuming themselves] able.

Name: The Pen
Verse: But when they saw it, they said, "Indeed, we are lost;

Name: The Pen
Verse: Rather, we have been deprived."

Name: The Pen
Verse: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, 'Why do you not exalt [ Allah ]?' "

Name: The Pen
Verse: They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."

Name: The Pen
Verse: Then they approached one another, blaming each other.

Name: The Pen
Verse: They said, "O woe to us; indeed we were transgressors.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Perhaps our Lord will substitute for us [one] better than it. Indeed, we are toward our Lord desirous."

Name: The Pen
Verse: Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Indeed, for the righteous with their Lord are the Gardens of Pleasure.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Then will We treat the Muslims like the criminals?

Name: The Pen
Verse: What is [the matter] with you? How do you judge?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or do you have a scripture in which you learn

Name: The Pen
Verse: That indeed for you is whatever you choose?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or do you have oaths [binding] upon Us, extending until the Day of Resurrection, that indeed for you is whatever you judge?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Ask them which of them, for that [claim], is responsible.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful.

Name: The Pen
Verse: The Day the shin will be uncovered and they are invited to prostration but the disbelievers will not be able,

Name: The Pen
Verse: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. And they used to be invited to prostration while they were sound.

Name: The Pen
Verse: So leave Me, [O Muhammad], with [the matter of] whoever denies the Qur'an. We will progressively lead them [to punishment] from where they do not know.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And I will give them time. Indeed, My plan is firm.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or do you ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Then be patient for the decision of your Lord, [O Muhammad], and be not like the companion of the fish when he called out while he was distressed.

Name: The Pen
Verse: If not that a favor from his Lord overtook him, he would have been thrown onto the naked shore while he was censured.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad."

Name: The Pen
Verse: But it is not except a reminder to the worlds.

Name: The Reality
Verse: The Inevitable Reality -

Name: The Reality
Verse: What is the Inevitable Reality?

Name: The Reality
Verse: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?

Name: The Reality
Verse: Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity.

Name: The Reality
Verse: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].

Name: The Reality
Verse: And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind

Name: The Reality
Verse: Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Then do you see of them any remains?

Name: The Reality
Verse: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].

Name: The Reality
Verse: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship

Name: The Reality
Verse: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast

Name: The Reality
Verse: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -

Name: The Reality
Verse: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,

Name: The Reality
Verse: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].

Name: The Reality
Verse: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.

Name: The Reality
Verse: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!

Name: The Reality
Verse: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."

Name: The Reality
Verse: So he will be in a pleasant life -

Name: The Reality
Verse: In an elevated garden,

Name: The Reality
Verse: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.

Name: The Reality
Verse: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record

Name: The Reality
Verse: And had not known what is my account.

Name: The Reality
Verse: I wish my death had been the decisive one.

Name: The Reality
Verse: My wealth has not availed me.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Gone from me is my authority."

Name: The Reality
Verse: Then into Hellfire drive him.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."

Name: The Reality
Verse: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah , the Most Great,

Name: The Reality
Verse: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.

Name: The Reality
Verse: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend

Name: The Reality
Verse: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;

Name: The Reality
Verse: None will eat it except the sinners.

Name: The Reality
Verse: So I swear by what you see

Name: The Reality
Verse: And what you do not see

Name: The Reality
Verse: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,

Name: The Reality
Verse: We would have seized him by the right hand;

Name: The Reality
Verse: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.

Name: The Reality
Verse: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: So be patient with gracious patience.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Indeed, they see it [as] distant,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: But We see it [as] near.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: On the Day the sky will be like murky oil,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And the mountains will be like wool,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And his wife and his brother

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And his nearest kindred who shelter him

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell],

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: A remover of exteriors.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And collected [wealth] and hoarded.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Indeed, mankind was created anxious:

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: When evil touches him, impatient,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And when good touches him, withholding [of it],

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Except the observers of prayer -

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Those who are constant in their prayer

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And those within whose wealth is a known right

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: For the petitioner and the deprived -

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe -

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And those who guard their private parts

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed -

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And those who are in their testimonies upright

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer:

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: They will be in gardens, honored.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muhammad],

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure?

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: So I swear by the Lord of [all] risings and settings that indeed We are able

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised -

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised.

Name: Noah
Verse: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."

Name: Noah
Verse: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,

Name: Noah
Verse: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah , when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "

Name: Noah
Verse: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

Name: Noah
Verse: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.

Name: Noah
Verse: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

Name: Noah
Verse: Then I invited them publicly.

Name: Noah
Verse: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

Name: Noah
Verse: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

Name: Noah
Verse: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

Name: Noah
Verse: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

Name: Noah
Verse: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

Name: Noah
Verse: While He has created you in stages?

Name: Noah
Verse: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

Name: Noah
Verse: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

Name: Noah
Verse: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

Name: Noah
Verse: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

Name: Noah
Verse: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

Name: Noah
Verse: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "

Name: Noah
Verse: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

Name: Noah
Verse: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.

Name: Noah
Verse: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.

Name: Noah
Verse: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

Name: Noah
Verse: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.

Name: Noah
Verse: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

Name: Noah
Verse: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

Name: Noah
Verse: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah ], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And [ Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision

Name: The Jinn
Verse: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah , so do not invoke with Allah anyone.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah , and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers

Name: The Jinn
Verse: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Half of it - or subtract from it a little

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired?

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah . So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah . It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah . Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: O you who covers himself [with a garment],

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Arise and warn

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And your Lord glorify

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And your clothing purify

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And uncleanliness avoid

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And do not confer favor to acquire more

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: But for your Lord be patient.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And when the trumpet is blown,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: That Day will be a difficult day

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: For the disbelievers - not easy.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Leave Me with the one I created alone

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And to whom I granted extensive wealth

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And children present [with him]

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Then he desires that I should add more.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: I will cover him with arduous torment.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Then he considered [again];

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Then he frowned and scowled;

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Then he turned back and was arrogant

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: This is not but the word of a human being."

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: I will drive him into Saqar.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And what can make you know what is Saqar?

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Blackening the skins.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Over it are nineteen [angels].

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: No! By the moon

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And [by] the night when it departs

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And [by] the morning when it brightens,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: As a warning to humanity -

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Except the companions of the right,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: About the criminals,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Nor did we used to feed the poor.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Until there came to us the certainty."

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: As if they were alarmed donkeys

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Fleeing from a lion?

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Then whoever wills will remember it.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: But man desires to continue in sin.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: So when vision is dazzled

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And the moon darkens

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And the sun and the moon are joined,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: No! There is no refuge.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Even if he presents his excuses.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: No! But you love the immediate

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And leave the Hereafter.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Looking at their Lord.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And the leg is wound about the leg,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: But [instead], he denied and turned away.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Woe to you, and woe!

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Then woe to you, and woe!

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Does man think that he will be left neglected?

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Then he was a clinging clot, and [ Allah ] created [his form] and proportioned [him]

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,

Name: Time or Man
Verse: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].

Name: Time or Man
Verse: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."

Name: Time or Man
Verse: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

Name: Time or Man
Verse: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And the winds that blow violently

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And those [angels] who bring criterion

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And those [angels] who deliver a message

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: As justification or warning,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: So when the stars are obliterated

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And when the heaven is opened

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And when the mountains are blown away

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And when the messengers' time has come...

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: For what Day was it postponed?

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: For the Day of Judgement.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Did We not destroy the former peoples?

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Then We will follow them with the later ones.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Thus do We deal with the criminals.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And We placed it in a firm lodging

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: For a known extent.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Have We not made the earth a container

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Of the living and the dead?

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: This is a Day they will not speak,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And fruits from whatever they desire,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: About what are they asking one another?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: About the great news -

Name: The Tidings
Verse: That over which they are in disagreement.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: No! They are going to know.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Then, no! They are going to know.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Have We not made the earth a resting place?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And the mountains as stakes?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And We created you in pairs

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And made your sleep [a means for] rest

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And made the night as clothing

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And made the day for livelihood

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And made [therein] a burning lamp

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water

Name: The Tidings
Verse: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And gardens of entwined growth.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -

Name: The Tidings
Verse: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait

Name: The Tidings
Verse: For the transgressors, a place of return,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: In which they will remain for ages [unending].

Name: The Tidings
Verse: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -

Name: The Tidings
Verse: An appropriate recompense.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Indeed, they were not expecting an account

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: But all things We have enumerated in writing.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Gardens and grapevines

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And a full cup.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -

Name: The Tidings
Verse: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: By those [angels] who extract with violence

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And [by] those who remove with ease

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And those who race each other in a race

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And those who arrange [each] matter,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: There will follow it the subsequent [one].

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Their eyes humbled.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Even if we should be decayed bones?

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Indeed, it will be but one shout,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And he showed him the greatest sign,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Then he turned his back, striving.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And he gathered [his people] and called out

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [ Allah ].

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And after that He spread the earth.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And the mountains He set firmly

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: So as for he who transgressed

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: And preferred the life of the world,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: To your Lord is its finality.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: You are only a warner for those who fear it.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: The Prophet frowned and turned away

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].

Name: He Frowned
Verse: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?

Name: He Frowned
Verse: As for he who thinks himself without need,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: To him you give attention.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]

Name: He Frowned
Verse: While he fears [ Allah ],

Name: He Frowned
Verse: From him you are distracted.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;

Name: He Frowned
Verse: So whoever wills may remember it.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Exalted and purified,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Noble and dutiful.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: From what substance did He create him?

Name: He Frowned
Verse: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Then He eased the way for him;

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Then let mankind look at his food -

Name: He Frowned
Verse: How We poured down water in torrents,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And caused to grow within it grain

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And grapes and herbage

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And olive and palm trees

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And gardens of dense shrubbery

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And fruit and grass -

Name: He Frowned
Verse: But when there comes the Deafening Blast

Name: He Frowned
Verse: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And his mother and his father

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And his wife and his children,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Blackness will cover them.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when the stars fall, dispersing,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when the mountains are removed

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when the wild beasts are gathered

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when the seas are filled with flame

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when the souls are paired

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: For what sin she was killed

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when the pages are made public

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when the sky is stripped away

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And when Paradise is brought near,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: So I swear by the retreating stars -

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And by the night as it closes in

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And by the dawn when it breathes

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And your companion is not [at all] mad.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: So where are you going?

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: When the sky breaks apart

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: And when the stars fall, scattering,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: And when the seas are erupted

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: No! But you deny the Recompense.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: Noble and recording;

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: They know whatever you do.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: And never therefrom will they be absent.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah .

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Woe to those who give less [than due],

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

Name: Defrauding
Verse: For a tremendous Day -

Name: Defrauding
Verse: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

Name: Defrauding
Verse: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?

Name: Defrauding
Verse: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Who deny the Day of Recompense.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

Name: Defrauding
Verse: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."

Name: Defrauding
Verse: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?

Name: Defrauding
Verse: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah ].

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

Name: Defrauding
Verse: On adorned couches, observing.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: And its mixture is of Tasneem,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: A spring from which those near [to Allah ] drink.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."

Name: Defrauding
Verse: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: On adorned couches, observing.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?

Name: The Sundering
Verse: When the sky has split [open]

Name: The Sundering
Verse: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

Name: The Sundering
Verse: And when the earth has been extended

Name: The Sundering
Verse: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]

Name: The Sundering
Verse: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -

Name: The Sundering
Verse: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: He will be judged with an easy account

Name: The Sundering
Verse: And return to his people in happiness.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: He will cry out for destruction

Name: The Sundering
Verse: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;

Name: The Sundering
Verse: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah ].

Name: The Sundering
Verse: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: So I swear by the twilight glow

Name: The Sundering
Verse: And [by] the night and what it envelops

Name: The Sundering
Verse: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

Name: The Sundering
Verse: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah ]?

Name: The Sundering
Verse: But those who have disbelieved deny,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: By the sky containing great stars

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: And [by] the promised Day

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Cursed were the companions of the trench

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: When they were sitting near it

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah , the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah , over all things, is Witness.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Honorable Owner of the Throne,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Effecter of what He intends.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: While Allah encompasses them from behind.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: But this is an honored Qur'an

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: By the sky and the night comer -

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: And what can make you know what is the night comer?

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: It is the piercing star -

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: So let man observe from what he was created.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: He was created from a fluid, ejected,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: Indeed, Allah , to return him [to life], is Able.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: Then man will have no power or any helper.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: By the sky which returns [rain]

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: And [by] the earth which cracks open,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: And it is not amusement.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: Indeed, they are planning a plan,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: But I am planning a plan.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.

Name: The Most High
Verse: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,

Name: The Most High
Verse: Who created and proportioned

Name: The Most High
Verse: And who destined and [then] guided

Name: The Most High
Verse: And who brings out the pasture

Name: The Most High
Verse: And [then] makes it black stubble.

Name: The Most High
Verse: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,

Name: The Most High
Verse: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.

Name: The Most High
Verse: And We will ease you toward ease.

Name: The Most High
Verse: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;

Name: The Most High
Verse: He who fears [ Allah ] will be reminded.

Name: The Most High
Verse: But the wretched one will avoid it -

Name: The Most High
Verse: Neither dying therein nor living.

Name: The Most High
Verse: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself

Name: The Most High
Verse: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.

Name: The Most High
Verse: But you prefer the worldly life,

Name: The Most High
Verse: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.

Name: The Most High
Verse: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,

Name: The Most High
Verse: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Working [hard] and exhausted.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: With their effort [they are] satisfied

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: In an elevated garden,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Within it is a flowing spring.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Within it are couches raised high

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: And cups put in place

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: And cushions lined up

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: And carpets spread around.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: And at the sky - how it is raised?

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: And at the mountains - how they are erected?

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: And at the earth - how it is spread out?

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: You are not over them a controller.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Indeed, to Us is their return.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: By the dawn

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And [by] ten nights

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And [by] the even [number] and the odd

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And [by] the night when it passes,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -

Name: The Dawn
Verse: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And increased therein the corruption.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."

Name: The Dawn
Verse: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."

Name: The Dawn
Verse: No! But you do not honor the orphan

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And you love wealth with immense love.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?

Name: The Dawn
Verse: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."

Name: The Dawn
Verse: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And enter among My [righteous] servants

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And enter My Paradise."

Name: The City
Verse: I swear by this city, Makkah -

Name: The City
Verse: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -

Name: The City
Verse: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],

Name: The City
Verse: We have certainly created man into hardship.

Name: The City
Verse: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?

Name: The City
Verse: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."

Name: The City
Verse: Does he think that no one has seen him?

Name: The City
Verse: Have We not made for him two eyes?

Name: The City
Verse: And a tongue and two lips?

Name: The City
Verse: And have shown him the two ways?

Name: The City
Verse: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.

Name: The City
Verse: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?

Name: The City
Verse: It is the freeing of a slave

Name: The City
Verse: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

Name: The City
Verse: An orphan of near relationship

Name: The City
Verse: Or a needy person in misery

Name: The City
Verse: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.

Name: The City
Verse: Those are the companions of the right.

Name: The City
Verse: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.

Name: The City
Verse: Over them will be fire closed in.

Name: The Sun
Verse: By the sun and its brightness

Name: The Sun
Verse: And [by] the moon when it follows it

Name: The Sun
Verse: And [by] the day when it displays it

Name: The Sun
Verse: And [by] the night when it covers it

Name: The Sun
Verse: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

Name: The Sun
Verse: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

Name: The Sun
Verse: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

Name: The Sun
Verse: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

Name: The Sun
Verse: He has succeeded who purifies it,

Name: The Sun
Verse: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

Name: The Sun
Verse: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

Name: The Sun
Verse: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

Name: The Sun
Verse: And the messenger of Allah [salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."

Name: The Sun
Verse: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

Name: The Sun
Verse: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.

Name: The Night
Verse: By the night when it covers

Name: The Night
Verse: And [by] the day when it appears

Name: The Night
Verse: And [by] He who created the male and female,

Name: The Night
Verse: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.

Name: The Night
Verse: As for he who gives and fears Allah

Name: The Night
Verse: And believes in the best [reward],

Name: The Night
Verse: We will ease him toward ease.

Name: The Night
Verse: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

Name: The Night
Verse: And denies the best [reward],

Name: The Night
Verse: We will ease him toward difficulty.

Name: The Night
Verse: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?

Name: The Night
Verse: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.

Name: The Night
Verse: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

Name: The Night
Verse: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.

Name: The Night
Verse: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.

Name: The Night
Verse: Who had denied and turned away.

Name: The Night
Verse: But the righteous one will avoid it -

Name: The Night
Verse: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded

Name: The Night
Verse: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.

Name: The Night
Verse: And he is going to be satisfied.

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: By the morning brightness

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: And He found you lost and guided [you],

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].

Name: Solace
Verse: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?

Name: Solace
Verse: And We removed from you your burden

Name: Solace
Verse: Which had weighed upon your back

Name: Solace
Verse: And raised high for you your repute.

Name: Solace
Verse: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

Name: Solace
Verse: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

Name: Solace
Verse: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].

Name: Solace
Verse: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.

Name: The Fig
Verse: By the fig and the olive

Name: The Fig
Verse: And [by] Mount Sinai

Name: The Fig
Verse: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],

Name: The Fig
Verse: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;

Name: The Fig
Verse: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,

Name: The Fig
Verse: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.

Name: The Fig
Verse: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?

Name: The Fig
Verse: Is not Allah the most just of judges?

Name: The Clot
Verse: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -

Name: The Clot
Verse: Created man from a clinging substance.

Name: The Clot
Verse: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -

Name: The Clot
Verse: Who taught by the pen -

Name: The Clot
Verse: Taught man that which he knew not.

Name: The Clot
Verse: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses

Name: The Clot
Verse: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.

Name: The Clot
Verse: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.

Name: The Clot
Verse: Have you seen the one who forbids

Name: The Clot
Verse: A servant when he prays?

Name: The Clot
Verse: Have you seen if he is upon guidance

Name: The Clot
Verse: Or enjoins righteousness?

Name: The Clot
Verse: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -

Name: The Clot
Verse: Does he not know that Allah sees?

Name: The Clot
Verse: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -

Name: The Clot
Verse: A lying, sinning forelock.

Name: The Clot
Verse: Then let him call his associates;

Name: The Clot
Verse: We will call the angels of Hell.

Name: The Clot
Verse: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah ].

Name: Power
Verse: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.

Name: Power
Verse: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

Name: Power
