Verse: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

Name: Power
Verse: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.

Name: Power
Verse: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: A Messenger from Allah , reciting purified scriptures

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: Within which are correct writings.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah , [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: And the earth discharges its burdens

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: That Day, it will report its news

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: Because your Lord has commanded it.

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

Name: The Coursers
Verse: By the racers, panting,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: And the producers of sparks [when] striking

Name: The Coursers
Verse: And the chargers at dawn,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.

Name: The Coursers
Verse: And indeed, he is to that a witness.

Name: The Coursers
Verse: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.

Name: The Coursers
Verse: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered

Name: The Coursers
Verse: And that within the breasts is obtained,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.

Name: The Calamity
Verse: The Striking Calamity -

Name: The Calamity
Verse: What is the Striking Calamity?

Name: The Calamity
Verse: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?

Name: The Calamity
Verse: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,

Name: The Calamity
Verse: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.

Name: The Calamity
Verse: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],

Name: The Calamity
Verse: He will be in a pleasant life.

Name: The Calamity
Verse: But as for one whose scales are light,

Name: The Calamity
Verse: His refuge will be an abyss.

Name: The Calamity
Verse: And what can make you know what that is?

Name: The Calamity
Verse: It is a Fire, intensely hot.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Until you visit the graveyards.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: No! You are going to know.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Then no! You are going to know.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: You will surely see the Hellfire.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.

Name: The Declining Day
Verse: By time,

Name: The Declining Day
Verse: Indeed, mankind is in loss,

Name: The Declining Day
Verse: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: Woe to every scorner and mocker

Name: The Traducer
Verse: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?

Name: The Traducer
Verse: It is the fire of Allah , [eternally] fueled,

Name: The Traducer
Verse: Which mounts directed at the hearts.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them

Name: The Traducer
Verse: In extended columns.

Name: The Elephant
Verse: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?

Name: The Elephant
Verse: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?

Name: The Elephant
Verse: And He sent against them birds in flocks,

Name: The Elephant
Verse: Striking them with stones of hard clay,

Name: The Elephant
Verse: And He made them like eaten straw.

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: For that is the one who drives away the orphan

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: So woe to those who pray

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: Those who make show [of their deeds]

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: And withhold [simple] assistance.

Name: Abundance
Verse: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

Name: Abundance
Verse: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].

Name: Abundance
Verse: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: Say, "O disbelievers,

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: I do not worship what you worship.

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."

Name: Succour
Verse: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

Name: Succour
Verse: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

Name: Succour
Verse: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.

Name: The Unity
Verse: Say, "He is Allah , [who is] One,

Name: The Unity
Verse: Allah , the Eternal Refuge.

Name: The Unity
Verse: He neither begets nor is born,

Name: The Unity
Verse: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: From the evil of that which He created

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: And from the evil of darkness when it settles

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: And from the evil of the blowers in knots

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."

Name: Mankind
Verse: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

Name: Mankind
Verse: The Sovereign of mankind.

Name: Mankind
Verse: The God of mankind,

Name: Mankind
Verse: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -

Name: Mankind
Verse: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -

Name: Mankind
Verse: From among the jinn and mankind."
